translation.en: -Hello? -Sonny, it's your dad. You asleep?
translation.zh: 喂？ 桑尼，我是爸爸 你还在睡觉？

translation.en: No. Hey, man. I was exercising.
translation.zh: 不，啊，嘿 我，我...我正在锻炼

translation.en: -Bullshit. You were sleeping. -I wasn't.
translation.zh: 胡说，你在睡觉 不，我没有，我没有

translation.en: This kid won't stop lying to me. You still act like you're 6.
translation.zh: 这孩子总对我撒谎 你的行为和你6岁时没啥两样

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dad. I act like I'm 6.
translation.zh: 哦，是的，好吧，爸爸 我还和6岁时一样

translation.en: Found a job yet where you work more than one day a week?
translation.zh: 找到正式工作了？ 不是那种 一周只上一天班的临时工

translation.en: I've been looking.
translation.zh: 啊...我正在找

translation.en: Looking won't pay the rent.
translation.zh: 正在找'不会给你付房租

translation.en: All the money I won from the cab accident...
translation.zh: 我从车祸中得到的赔偿金

translation.en: ...is kicking ass in the stock market, so relax.
translation.zh: 放在股票市场已经长了 别担心

translation.en: -Don't blow it on worthless crap. -I won't.
translation.zh: 行了，别再跟我胡说八道了 我没有

translation.en: You should spend it on your bar exam.
translation.zh: 知道你该做什么吗？ 参加律师考试

translation.en: You're the lawyer. I ain't taking a bar exam.
translation.zh: 你是我们家的律师 我才不去考什么鬼试

translation.en: I got too much other shit going on.
translation.zh: 生活中我要考虑的其他事 太多了

translation.en: I don't know what happened to you.
translation.zh: -真不知道你到底是怎么了 -好吧

translation.en: How're things going with your girlfriend, Vanessa?
translation.zh: 还有，你和女朋友的事 怎么样了？ 她叫什么，瓦妮莎？

translation.en: Things are going fine.
translation.zh: 一切都很好

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我得挂了，爸爸

translation.en: Shit! You turned off the alarm clock again.
translation.zh: 该死！ 讨厌！ 你又把闹钟关掉了

translation.en: No! I mean, yes, I did, but I thought you needed more sleep.
translation.zh: 不不不，我是说是的 是我关的 我不知道 我想让你多睡一会，瓦妮莎

translation.en: I shouldn't have stayed here. That was a jerk thing to do.
translation.zh: 我早知道我根本不该住在这儿 我真是愚蠢之极，多谢了

translation.en: Why are you going to work? It's Sunday.
translation.zh: 你要干什么？ 为什么要上班，今天是星期天

translation.en: I'm not going to work. I'm going to brunch with potential clients.
translation.zh: 我不是去上班 是去和潜在的客户吃饭

translation.en: That's how a party planner gets business, by making contacts.
translation.zh: 这样晚会策划师才能有生意做 广泛结识，勤于接触

translation.en: Meet with me. I'll order in from Cozy's. We'll have fun.
translation.zh: 留下来陪我 我从科西餐厅叫了外卖 我们会很快活

translation.en: I am sick of Cozy's. You order in from there all the time.
translation.zh: 科西餐厅的饭我吃够了！ 你天天从那儿订餐 那个送货员像是你最好的朋友

translation.en: The delivery guy's your best friend.
translation.zh: 你天天从那儿订餐 那个送货员像是你最好的朋友

translation.en: He happens to be pretty damn nice.
translation.zh: 他真的是个很不错的人 天啊！

translation.en: This is a rough patch in my life.
translation.zh: 我现在正处于人生的低潮 明白吗？

translation.en: Syracuse is 0 and 3. And I got those medical problems.
translation.zh: 锡拉丘兹大学队连续输3场 我的身体很不好

translation.en: Medical problems?
translation.zh: 身体不好？ 两年前一辆出租车压了你的脚

translation.en: A cab runs over your foot two years ago. You're hospitalized one night.
translation.zh: 身体不好？ 两年前一辆出租车压了你的脚 你在医院只待了一个晚上

translation.en: First of all, that cab was huge.
translation.zh: 首先那辆出租车巨大

translation.en: And a jury decided that one night of pain was worth $200,000.
translation.zh: 其次法庭判定我一晚上的痛苦 价值20万美元

translation.en: -So there you go. -Whatever.
translation.zh: 就是这么回事 随你怎么说

translation.en: Why are you being so nuts to me lately?
translation.zh: 你是怎么了？ 最近为什么总看我不顺眼？

translation.en: You refuse to move on to the next phase.
translation.zh: 为你拒绝在人生的道路上 向前迈一步

translation.en: I'd like to have a family someday.
translation.zh: 我希望有朝一日能有个家！ 但我需要一个能依靠的男人

translation.en: I need someone I can rely on, not a playmate.
translation.zh: 我希望有朝一日能有个家！ 但我需要一个能依靠的男人 不是一个玩伴

translation.en: You need a father figure? "Stop pulling your sister's hair!"
translation.zh: 你需要什么，一个父亲？ 别揪妹妹的头发

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna go to Syracuse to see my mom.
translation.zh: 知道吗？ 我要去锡拉丘兹看我妈妈

translation.en: -I'll be back on Wednesday. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 星期三回来 什...你在说什么？

translation.en: I had call for delivery, but it was crank call. You want chocolate cake?
translation.zh: 这楼里有人打电话订餐 可我看是个恶作剧 你们喜欢巧克力蛋糕吗？

translation.en: Come back later. I'll Indian wrestle you.
translation.zh: 现在不行，过一会儿再来 我跟你来印第安式摔跤

translation.en: You're going down, sucker.
translation.zh: 你完蛋了，小子

translation.en: We'll see about that.
translation.zh: 对，到时候瞧吧

translation.en: Okay. Peace, out.
translation.zh: 好吧，再见

translation.en: You're going to Syracuse?
translation.zh: 你要回锡拉丘兹 什么意思？

translation.en: I need time to think and so do you.
translation.zh: 我需要时间好好想想 你也一样

translation.en: Think about what?
translation.zh: 你让我想什么？

translation.en: Your life and why I should be a part of it.
translation.zh: 你的生活以及我为什么 要成为你生活的一部分

translation.en: -All right. -While you're at it...
translation.zh: 那好吧 思考的同时 为何不考虑找份真正的工作！

translation.en: ...think about getting a real job.
translation.zh: 思考的同时 为何不考虑找份真正的工作！

translation.en: I got a real job!
translation.zh: 嘿，我有真正的工作！

translation.en: Patrick Ewing, nice shot.
translation.zh: 帕特里克埃文斯 打得好！

translation.en: -Hey, Sonny. -What's up, buddy boy?
translation.zh: 嘿，桑尼 你好吗，老伙计？那我走了

translation.en: I'm out the door. Hey, pal.
translation.zh: 你好吗，老伙计？那我走了 嘿，朋友

translation.en: -Where you going? -Manhattan.
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿？ 曼哈顿

translation.en: You wanna take me with you?
translation.zh: 曼哈顿？捎我一段行吗？

translation.en: All right, I guess.
translation.zh: 好吧，没问题

translation.en: Hold on to your money. Later on.
translation.zh: 钱不用交了 回头见，伙计

translation.en: Okay, take care, Sonny.
translation.zh: 好咧，多保重，桑尼

translation.en: See you.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Cadillac, I love it.
translation.zh: 卡迪拉克，我喜欢

translation.en: Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: Just ignore him.
translation.zh: 错了错了，嘘嘘嘘嘘...

translation.en: It's only Sonny. It's only Sonny.
translation.zh: 不过是桑尼，不过是桑尼

translation.en: Yeah, it's only me. It's only me.
translation.zh: 对，不过是我，不过是我

translation.en: -What's going on? -Corinne's going-away party for Kevin.
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？ 科琳娜要给凯文 一个惊喜饯行晚会

translation.en: She didn't tell me. The roommate has a right to know.
translation.zh: 她为什么事先不告诉我 室友有权知道

translation.en: She knew you'd ruin the surprise.
translation.zh: 因为她知道你会泄密 那就不是惊喜了

translation.en: No, I wouldn't.
translation.zh: 不，我不会说

translation.en: Hey, surprise.
translation.zh: 嘿，惊喜！

translation.en: Surprise.
translation.zh: 惊喜...

translation.en: -Surprise. -Surprise.
translation.zh: 惊喜... 惊喜

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？

translation.en: We wasted the good surprise on you.
translation.zh: 我们把满腔热情 都浪费在你身上了！

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Is this your handiwork?
translation.zh: 是你把她惹哭了？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.zh: 我想是

translation.en: See you in three hours.
translation.zh: 三小时后见

translation.en: Good to see you stiffs. What've you been doing?
translation.zh: 真高兴看到 你这家伙又露面了 都在忙些什么？

translation.en: Last three weeks have been crazy. I've been in Denver, Dallas--
translation.zh: 连续3个星期没一点空闲 去了丹佛、达拉斯、旧金山

translation.en: I'm sleeping in the office. We're going to trial on the fraud case.
translation.zh: 我一直睡在办公室 我们准备起诉一桩 有价证券欺诈案

translation.en: Honey, it was a great surprise. I was totally shocked.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这是一个了不起的惊喜 把我吓了一大跳！

translation.en: No, you weren't! And I worked so hard on this.
translation.zh: 你才没有 我费了好大劲准备的

translation.en: Need some help?
translation.zh: 需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: -Honey, your sister's here. -Hey, sweetie.
translation.zh: 亲爱的，你姐姐来了 嘿，亲爱的

translation.en: I hate Sonny.
translation.zh: 我讨厌桑尼！

translation.en: My client's out $7 million. All we can sue on is breach of contract.
translation.zh: 我的委托人损失了7百万美元 可我们只能起诉他违约

translation.en: Maybe you can sue under the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
translation.zh: 也许你该试试指控他违反 外国人舞弊法

translation.en: I gotta get back to the office. You're the king.
translation.zh: 我得马上回办公室 桑尼，你是个天才！

translation.en: Mikey, a pleasure.
translation.zh: 再见 麦奇 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -I'll see you at home. -All right.
translation.zh: 咱们回家见！

translation.en: I'll walk you out.
translation.zh: -我送你出去 -好

translation.en: I gotta admit, I'm still weirded out when they kiss.
translation.zh: 我得承认 看他们接吻我还是觉得怪怪的

translation.en: Why? They're gay. That's what gay guys do.
translation.zh: 为什么？他们是同性恋 同性恋都这样

translation.en: I know, but they were like brothers to us back in school.
translation.zh: 对，我知道 可在学校时 我一直把他们当我们的兄弟

translation.en: They're still like our brothers. Our very, very gay brothers.
translation.zh: 他们现在仍是我们的兄弟 我们的同性恋兄弟

translation.en: What are you doing after this? Going to a Klan meeting?
translation.zh: 对 你打算干什么？ 参加三K党集会？

translation.en: Remember when Dad had that barbecue...
translation.zh: 记得吗，有一次爸爸 为他同事们准备了烧烤晚会

translation.en: ...for his friends and it rained...
translation.zh: 记得吗，有一次爸爸 为他同事们准备了烧烤晚会 后来下雨了

translation.en: ...so he and Mom went into the kitchen and made...
translation.zh: 他和妈妈不得不在厨房 用一只煎锅做一百多个汉堡包

translation.en: ...100 hamburgers with one frying pan?
translation.zh: 他和妈妈不得不在厨房 用一只煎锅做一百多个汉堡包 记得

translation.en: You're not gonna let a little rain stop you from making 100 hamburgers.
translation.zh: 你不会让一场小雨 阻止你做一百个汉堡包吧？

translation.en: That relationship's lasted longer than I thought it would.
translation.zh: 我没想到 他俩的关系能维持这么久

translation.en: Look at his eyes. He's bored. I give it two more weeks.
translation.zh: 看他的眼睛 我断定不出两个星期 他就会对她感到厌倦

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Everybody!
translation.zh: 嘿，请听我说，各位

translation.en: I'm sorry. I wanted to thank you for coming tonight.
translation.zh: 对不起 我要感谢你们今晚能来

translation.en: I guess I should say--
translation.zh: 我想我应该这么说

translation.en: I'm getting it. Tomorrow I'm leaving for China...
translation.zh: 我正在学 明天我就要去中国 代表摩顿和曼戴尔法律公司

translation.en: ...to represent the firm of Morton and Mandel.
translation.zh: 明天我就要去中国 代表摩顿和曼戴尔法律公司

translation.en: Me, the same guy who once shaved his ass to win a $5 bet.
translation.zh: 当初我为了赢得5美元的赌注 差点输的光屁股

translation.en: Prove it!
translation.zh: 让我们看看...

translation.en: Just kidding.
translation.zh: 开个玩笑

translation.en: But I am real glad you're all here tonight, because...
translation.zh: 我真的很高兴 今晚你们都在这儿因为...

translation.en: ...I'm gonna do what I never thought I'd have the guts to do.
translation.zh: 我要做一件我一直 认为我没胆量做的事

translation.en: You're not proposing, are you?
translation.zh: 你不是要求婚吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, pal, I am. -Well, think about it, you know?
translation.zh: 是的，没错 我说，你可要三思而后行啊

translation.en: God, Sonny, shut up!
translation.zh: 天哪，桑尼，你闭嘴！

translation.en: Anyway, will you?
translation.zh: 好吧，啊，你愿意吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 愿意

translation.en: Good call on the two weeks.
translation.zh: 两个星期的预测真准

translation.en: Sonny, what was that all about?
translation.zh: 桑尼，你搞什么鬼呀？

translation.en: Congratulations. You and Big Boobs McGee are gonna be happy.
translation.zh: 嘿，恭喜你 祝你和大胸脯麦姬白头到老

translation.en: Don't call her that.
translation.zh: 别叫她大胸脯麦姬

translation.en: You wanna tell your children you met their mother as a waitress at Hooters?
translation.zh: 你想告诉你的孩子们 说你是在丰乳酒吧 认识他们妈妈的？

translation.en: Sonny, that was five years ago. She's a doctor now...
translation.zh: 桑尼，那是5年前的事了 她现在是医生，我的未婚妻

translation.en: ...and my fiancée, so from now on...
translation.zh: 桑尼，那是5年前的事了 她现在是医生，我的未婚妻 所以从现在起你叫她 大胸脯麦姬医生

translation.en: ...Dr. Big Boobs McGee.
translation.zh: 所以从现在起你叫她 大胸脯麦姬医生

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Thanks, man.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 谢谢

translation.en: I just...
translation.zh: 我只是，嗯

translation.en: ...got shit going on.
translation.zh: 心情不好，所以...

translation.en: What's the matter?
translation.zh: 出了什么事？

translation.en: Vanessa's gonna break up with me... ...and I don't know how to make her wanna stay.
translation.zh: 瓦妮莎要和我分手 我不知道该怎么办才能留住她

translation.en: She's getting older. She wants different things.
translation.zh: 瓦妮莎长大了 她想要的东西不一样了

translation.en: Career, stable relationship, a family.
translation.zh: 事业、稳定的关系、家庭

translation.en: That's how they get.
translation.zh: 女人都是这样

translation.en: I want things to go back to the way they used to be.
translation.zh: 我只想回到过去的美好时光

translation.en: When we were at Syracuse, and Vanessa worshiped you.
translation.zh: -像我们在锡拉丘兹大学？ -对 那时瓦妮莎崇拜你

translation.en: -That was nice. -Nobody hassled you to get a job.
translation.zh: 是啊，那感觉真好 也没人逼着你找工作 汤米和菲利也不在一起洗澡

translation.en: Tommy and Phil showered separately.
translation.zh: 也没人逼着你找工作 汤米和菲利也不在一起洗澡

translation.en: Those were the days.
translation.zh: 好日子都过去了

translation.en: -What're you doing? -If I make this...
translation.zh: -你要干什么？ -我若打进这个球

translation.en: ...Vanessa will realize she likes me the way I am.
translation.zh: 瓦妮莎就会意识到 她爱的是现在的我

translation.en: You're going to the putt. Remember, the roof breaks to the right.
translation.zh: 噢，你一定能打进 记住，屋顶有点向右倾斜

translation.en: Yes! That's what I'm talk--
translation.zh: 太好了！我就是这个意思！

translation.en: Good God!
translation.zh: 噢天哪！

translation.en: That can't be good.
translation.zh: 这不是好兆头

translation.en: Where's Kevin?
translation.zh: 凯文在哪儿？

translation.en: He already left. I guess he forgot to say goodbye to you.
translation.zh: 哦，他已经走了！ 他可能忘了和你说声再见

translation.en: -Why are you here? -I'm cleaning because you're useless.
translation.zh: 嗯，那你怎么还在这儿？ 给你打扫干净 因为你是个废物

translation.en: Then what, you gonna go to your Hooters reunion?
translation.zh: 然后呢？ 去参加酒吧女招待联欢会？

translation.en: You guys talk about whose ass hangs out of their shorts the most?
translation.zh: 你们可以坐着在那儿 议论谁的短裤包不住屁股

translation.en: At least I can fit my ass in my shorts, fatty.
translation.zh: 至少我的短裤 能包住我的屁股，胖子

translation.en: Speaking of fatty, whose is this?
translation.zh: 你说我胖，这是谁的？

translation.en: -I don't know. -I'm eating it then.
translation.zh: -不知道 -那我就吃了

translation.en: "We wasted the good surprise on you."
translation.zh: 我们把满腔热情 都浪费在你身上了！

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: Lady gave me $5 to bring him here.
translation.zh: 一个女人给我5块钱 让我把他送到这

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Later.
translation.zh: -你什么意思？ -再见！

translation.en: Are you selling raffle tickets?
translation.zh: 怎么，你是卖彩票的吗？

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: -Kevin Gerrity. -I got something to tell you.
translation.zh: 凯文盖瑞蒂 是我，有件事得告诉你

translation.en: -What's up? -There's a kid here.
translation.zh: 出了什么事？ 这里有个孩子

translation.en: What kind of kid?
translation.zh: 啊？什么孩子

translation.en: If this note is true, it's your kid.
translation.zh: 啊，如果条子上写的是真的 他是你儿子

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你在胡说什么呀？

translation.en: I'm having a tough time reading this...
translation.zh: 这上面的字看着挺费劲

translation.en: ...but it says, "Dear Kevin: This is Julian, your son.
translation.zh: 我想是这样 亲爱的凯文 他叫朱利安 是你的儿子

translation.en: I hope you understand why I didn't tell you until now...
translation.zh: 希望你能理解我没早告诉你

translation.en: ...but he needs your help. I can't be his mother anymore."
translation.zh: 但现在他需要你的帮助 我无法再做他的妈妈了

translation.en: -This is ridiculous. -Hang on.
translation.zh: 这太荒谬了！ 等等，等一下！

translation.en: Who's this?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: This is my friend.
translation.zh: 他是我的...朋友

translation.en: -Is that Kevin on the phone? -No, it's my Uncle Remus.
translation.zh: 你在和凯文通电话？ 不，是我的舅舅雷米斯

translation.en: Hi. What's your name?
translation.zh: 嗨，你叫什么？

translation.en: Is he all right?
translation.zh: 他没事吧？

translation.en: He doesn't like you. Leave us alone.
translation.zh: 没事，他只是不喜欢你 别烦我们

translation.en: You're such a dick.
translation.zh: 神经病！

translation.en: That was your girlfriend. She was acting "Hooterific."
translation.zh: 是你女朋友 她女招待的毛病又发作了

translation.en: -Who sent that note? -"Jan."
translation.zh: 信是谁写的？ 简

translation.en: Jan.... I don't know any Jan.
translation.zh: 简？我不认识叫简的

translation.en: -Where's he from? -Where are you from?
translation.zh: 他从哪儿来？ 你从哪儿来，朋友？

translation.en: Buffalo.
translation.zh: 水牛城

translation.en: I've never even been to Buffalo.
translation.zh: 水牛城？我从没去过水牛城

translation.en: Maybe it's a mistake.
translation.zh: -有人在跟我开玩笑 -也许是个误会

translation.en: Is this like the time you said my parents were dead?
translation.zh: 真的有什么孩子吗？ 像你上次说我父母意外身亡？

translation.en: I swear, he's right here.
translation.zh: 我向上帝发誓他就在这儿

translation.en: I'm coming home. I don't know what I'll say--
translation.zh: 我马上回去 真不知道该怎么解释...

translation.en: Hang on. It says...
translation.zh: 不不不不，等等

translation.en: ..."If you won't take responsibility for him, they found a foster family--"
translation.zh: 上面还说 如果你不肯对这孩子负责 他们为他找了个寄养家庭

translation.en: Yes, Uncle Remus, I know the catfish are huge.
translation.zh: 是的，雷米斯舅舅 我知道鲶鱼很大

translation.en: That's terrific.
translation.zh: 你太棒了！

translation.en: Here's a number for a guy...
translation.zh: 这儿有个电话号码

translation.en: ...at City Social Service. Arthur Brooks. I'll call.
translation.zh: 是社会福利局的阿瑟布鲁克斯 我能给他打电话

translation.en: -I'll come home. -I'll take care of it.
translation.zh: -我还是回去吧 -不不不不，这事交给我吧

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你肯定你能行？

translation.en: Yeah, don't worry.
translation.zh: 是的，我能行，别担心

translation.en: Hooters. Hooters. Hooters!
translation.zh: 丰乳酒吧，丰乳酒吧！

translation.en: -All right. Thanks a lot. -Later.
translation.zh: 那好吧，听着桑尼，多谢了 好，再见

translation.en: I'm gonna make another phone call. You want to come and sit down, pal?
translation.zh: 我还要再打一个电话 你想过来坐下吗，朋友？

translation.en: Or you can stand there. Anything you want. I'll be a minute.
translation.zh: 站在那儿也可以，随你的便 我马上就好

translation.en: Social Services is closed today, Columbus Day.
translation.zh: 今天哥伦比亚日 社会福利局不办公

translation.en: We'll be open tomorrow at 8 a.m.
translation.zh: 明早8点上班

translation.en: Columbus Day.
translation.zh: 哥伦比亚日

translation.en: Boy, I don't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么跟你说，朋友

translation.en: Everything's gonna get figured out tomorrow.
translation.zh: 别担心，明天事情就全清楚了

translation.en: Can you be a tough little guy until then?
translation.zh: 你能当个小男子汉 支持到明天吗？

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Do I need to get you a bottle of formula or something?
translation.zh: 嘿，我给你买瓶婴儿奶吧？

translation.en: -No. -What do you eat?
translation.zh: 不 你吃什么？

translation.en: Food.
translation.zh: 食物

translation.en: Yeah? I eat food too.
translation.zh: 是吗？我也吃食物

translation.en: What--? Come on.
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 来吧

translation.en: You need me to hold your hand?
translation.zh: 要我拉着你的手？

translation.en: On Mondays, I go to Central Park and watch rollerbladers fall down.
translation.zh: 每个星期一下午我要做的就是 去中央公园看玩轮滑的人摔跤

translation.en: -You into that? -I don't know.
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗？ 我不知道

translation.en: Watch. This guy's humming.
translation.zh: 看，这个人滑得好快

translation.en: He's going down, he's going down, he's going--!
translation.zh: 噢噢噢，他要摔了 要摔了要摔了 他过去了

translation.en: How old are you, anyways?
translation.zh: 你今年几岁了

translation.en: -Five. -Five?
You wear a diaper?
translation.zh: 还要用尿片吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -You wipe your own ass then? -Yes.
translation.zh: -会自己擦屁股吗？ -会

translation.en: You do? Good job. That's cool.
translation.zh: 是吗？太棒了，真酷

translation.en: Come on, fall down. Fall down. Yes! Come on, damn it.
translation.zh: 快，摔跤，摔跤！ 快摔，见鬼！

translation.en: You suck. You suck!
translation.zh: 该死！该死！该死！

translation.en: Check this out.
translation.zh: 你看我的

translation.en: My God!
translation.zh: 我的上帝

translation.en: There's a stick there. Somebody should move it.
translation.zh: 那有根树枝 应该把它拿开！

translation.en: All right now, what way would you put that on?
translation.zh: 好吧，换了你 你准备怎么做？呃？

translation.en: This Columbo, he pretends to be stupid... ...but he's really smart as a tack.
translation.zh: 这个哥伦布一直在装傻 其实他特别聪明

translation.en: Oh, yeah, he is.
translation.zh: 对，是这样

translation.en: I wipe my own ass.
translation.zh: 我自己擦屁股

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: So, Mr. Ass Wiper, what's this guy's name?
translation.zh: 擦屁股先生 啊 这家伙叫什么名字？

translation.en: Scuba Steve.
translation.zh: 蛙人史蒂夫

translation.en: Does he ever take his flippers off?
translation.zh: 我喜欢他的蛙鞋 他从来不脱鞋吗？

translation.en: What if he goes bowling?
translation.zh: 不 要打保龄球怎么办？ 他们不要他穿保龄鞋吗？

translation.en: They don't make him wear bowling shoes? He wears flippers?
translation.zh: 要打保龄球怎么办？ 他们不要他穿保龄鞋吗？ 允许他穿蛙鞋？

translation.en: -Really? -I had a doll like that at one time.
translation.zh: -是 -真的？ 我小时候也有个这样娃娃 可我的猫把他的脑袋咬掉了

translation.en: But my cat, he bite his head off.
translation.zh: 我小时候也有个这样娃娃 可我的猫把他的脑袋咬掉了

translation.en: What cat would do that?
translation.zh: 什么猫会这么干？

translation.en: You calling me a liar?
translation.zh: 你是说我在撒谎？

translation.en: Hey, take it easy.
translation.zh: 嘿，冷静点

translation.en: Anyways... ...Jets are playing tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚的足球赛有纽约喷气机队 咱们去布拉内酒吧看，好吗？

translation.en: We're gonna go to the Blarney Stone. Wanna come?
translation.zh: 今晚的足球赛有纽约喷气机队 咱们去布拉内酒吧看，好吗？ 想和我们一起去吗？

translation.en: I've got more deliveries.
translation.zh: 我自行车上还有食物没送完

translation.en: Maybe you can also finish the turkey on your lip.
translation.zh: 那好，也许 你还可以先吃完嘴边上火鸡

translation.en: Right there.
translation.zh: 就在那儿，对

translation.en: Let's crank up the Styx.
translation.zh: 布拉内酒吧 冥河乐队歌声开大点

translation.en: No music during the game.
translation.zh: 比赛时别放音乐

translation.en: -It's halftime. Relax, Mr. Herlihy. -Goddamn Jets.
translation.zh: 现在是中场休息 别担心，赫利希先生 该死的喷气机！

translation.en: What are you doing in here, cutie?
translation.zh: 你在这儿干什么，小东西？

translation.en: Watching football.
translation.zh: 看足球赛

translation.en: -Who do you want to win? -The goddamn Jets.
translation.zh: 你希望谁赢？ 该死的喷气机

translation.en: Have fun.
translation.zh: 好好看

translation.en: Too bad you don't like girls. I think you could've had her.
translation.zh: 可惜你不喜欢女孩 我觉得你能把她钩上手

translation.en: -I'm thirsty. -You're thirsty?
translation.zh: 我渴了 你渴了？

translation.en: -Are you allowed soda? -I don't know.
translation.zh: 想喝什么？ 汽水？ 妈妈让你喝吗？ 不知道

translation.en: My mom always said soda rots your teeth...
translation.zh: 我妈妈总是说喝汽水腐蚀牙齿

translation.en: ...but you'll lose them anyway, so rot on.
translation.zh: 可牙齿总是会掉的 让它腐蚀好了，对吗？

translation.en: -Can we get two root beers? -Sure.
translation.zh: 请给我们两杯汽水 就来

translation.en: When I graduated law school, we met here every Monday to watch football.
translation.zh: 刚从法学院毕业时 我们每星期一都来这看足球赛

translation.en: Who would meet you?
translation.zh: 你和谁？

translation.en: My friends, Vanessa.
translation.zh: 我的朋友和瓦妮莎

translation.en: Vanessa always rooted against the team...
translation.zh: 瓦妮莎总是跟我唱反调 支持另一个队

translation.en: ...I wanted to win just to bust my chops.
translation.zh: 就为惹我发火

translation.en: But everybody's so busy with their crap lately, no one comes.
translation.zh: 现在每个人都在忙自己的事 再没人来了

translation.en: Like I'm not busy?
translation.zh: 你是说我不忙？

translation.en: Shut up or I'll smack you through the wall like last Monday.
translation.zh: 嘿，赫利希先生你闭嘴 不然我像上周一那样 把你打到墙外面去

translation.en: Last Monday was a fluke. Bring it on, woman.
translation.zh: 上星期你侥幸得逞 来呀，小娘们

translation.en: Anytime.
translation.zh: 随时奉陪

translation.en: He drinks a lot of soda.
translation.zh: 他汽水喝多了

translation.en: I'm telling you, buddy. Vanessa, she's the one. I can't lose her.
translation.zh: 告诉你，朋友 我心里 只有瓦妮莎，不能失去她

translation.en: I'm not getting any handsomer.
translation.zh: 我不再越来越英俊 这我知道

translation.en: Every day I get a little bit older and balder and fatter.
translation.zh: 每天我都在变老变秃变胖

translation.en: -Fatter? -At your age...
translation.zh: 变胖？ 对，我像你这么大时 想吃啥就吃啥，就是不长肉

translation.en: ...I could eat anything. Wouldn't gain an ounce.
translation.zh: 对，我像你这么大时 想吃啥就吃啥，就是不长肉

translation.en: Now, I have a chocolate shake, my ass jiggles for a week.
translation.zh: 现在喝杯巧克力奶昔 屁股都要晃一个星期

translation.en: -Enjoy the metabolism while you got it. -Metalobism?
translation.zh: 趁年轻好好享受 你的新陈代谢吧 新陈代谢？

translation.en: Good God, it's 2:30 in the morning. You must be wrecked.
translation.zh: 我的天，都凌晨2点半了 你一定累坏了

translation.en: Anyways, I had fun today. Did you have fun?
translation.zh: 总之，今天我很快乐 你高兴吗？

translation.en: Yeah, you're all right.
translation.zh: 啊，你是个好小伙

translation.en: Have a good one.
translation.zh: 睡个好觉

translation.en: Sonny?
translation.zh: 桑尼？

translation.en: Could I have a night-light?
translation.zh: 能开个小灯吗？

translation.en: Night-light? I think I can help you out. Hang on.
translation.zh: 小灯？ 我看我帮你想办法？ 等一下

translation.en: There you go, all right?
translation.zh: 裸体真人 给你这个，行了吧？

translation.en: Sonny?
translation.zh: 桑尼

translation.en: Are you my dad?
translation.zh: 你是我爸爸吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not, but...
translation.zh: 不，我不是

translation.en: ...that Dad and Mom thing we'll figure out in the morning.
translation.zh: 不过爸爸妈妈的事 咱们到早上再解决，好吗？

translation.en: You just go to sleep.
translation.zh: 你睡觉吧

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安 -晚安

translation.en: Go get the can, okay?
translation.zh: 去把它拣回来，好吗？

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 去，去，去！

translation.en: I'm thinking about keeping the kid.
translation.zh: 我在考虑留下这孩子

translation.en: Sonny.
translation.zh: 桑尼

translation.en: Remember when we went to the pet store...
translation.zh: 有一次你陪我到宠物店买鱼食 你看见一只可爱的小狗想养它

translation.en: ...and you wanted that puppy, but I reminded you about feeding it...
translation.zh: 有一次你陪我到宠物店买鱼食 你看见一只可爱的小狗想养它 我当时提醒你，你要喂它 给它洗澡、训练它上厕所

translation.en: ...cleaning it and toilet training it?
translation.zh: 我当时提醒你，你要喂它 给它洗澡、训练它上厕所 我记得

translation.en: This is kind of like that, except with a human.
translation.zh: 这就和那一样 只不过现在是个人

translation.en: I mean, I'm glad you had fun and all, but this is big.
translation.zh: 看见你喜欢他我也很高兴 可是嗯，这是件大事

translation.en: I gotta do something big. I think Vanessa will respect that.
translation.zh: 我这一生必须做一件大事 这样瓦妮莎才会尊重我

translation.en: You think that since women get pregnant... ...to fix a troubled relationship...
translation.zh: 你认为有些女人 为了挽救失败的婚姻而怀孕

translation.en: ...why can't a guy adopt a kid to do the same?
translation.zh: 所以一个男人为了同样目的 可以领养一个孩子？

translation.en: I didn't think of it like that. But yes, that's what I'm thinking.
translation.zh: 我倒没有这样想过，不过 是个好主意，这正是我想要的

translation.en: Sounds nuts to me, pal. Do yourself a favor. Sleep on it.
translation.zh: 我看这主意挺傻，伙计 帮自己个忙，好好考虑一下

translation.en: You're right. Can I use your phone?
translation.zh: 你说的对 能用一下你的手机吗？

translation.en: Arthur Brooks speaking.
translation.zh: 喂，我是阿瑟布鲁克斯

translation.en: How you doing? Kevin Gerrity.
translation.zh: 布鲁克斯先生，你好吗？ 我是凯文盖瑞蒂

translation.en: Right on, Mr. Gerrity.
translation.zh: 噢是的，盖瑞蒂先生

translation.en: We were expecting you.
translation.zh: 我们正在等你的电话

translation.en: Do you still got a foster family lined up for Julian?
translation.zh: 我想知道朱利安的领养家庭 是不是安排好了？

translation.en: Yes, we do.
translation.zh: 是的，安排好了

translation.en: I've decided to take care of the little guy.
translation.zh: 你可以回绝他们了 我决定自己照顾这孩子

translation.en: Way to sleep on it, pal.
translation.zh: 想好了再说，伙计

translation.en: You two want to get married, I support that.
translation.zh: 嘿，你们俩要结婚我支持 别来烦我

translation.en: When parents take the responsibility, there's no bigger high for us.
translation.zh: 亲生父母负起责任 没有比这更让我们高兴的了

translation.en: I'm psyched about it too.
translation.zh: 我也觉得很兴奋，老兄

translation.en: So that's it.
translation.zh: 那好，就这么定了

translation.en: Yep. Good luck to you and your son.
translation.zh: 好，就这么定了 祝你和儿子好运

translation.en: My son.
translation.zh: 我儿子！

translation.en: Goddamn stick!
translation.zh: 该死的树枝！

translation.en: That's my boy.
translation.zh: 真是我儿子

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Go back to sleep.
translation.zh: 回去睡觉好吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm going back to sleep. Nighty-night.
translation.zh: 我要再睡一觉，晚安

translation.en: I wet my bed.
translation.zh: 我尿床了

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: That's a shitload of piss.
translation.zh: 你的尿可真多

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: There you go, all right? No more wet mess.
translation.zh: 可以了，别再尿床了

translation.en: Sleep, all right? Just try to sleep. Stay asleep.
translation.zh: 睡觉吧，再睡一会别起床

translation.en: Sit still!
translation.zh: 坐好别动

translation.en: Lay!
translation.zh: 躺好！

translation.en: All right! I'm up!
translation.zh: 好吧，我起床！

translation.en: It smells like urine in this joint. Good job.
translation.zh: 我怎么闻着屋子里有尿味啊 干得好！

translation.en: What're you doing there, boy?
translation.zh: 你在做什么，孩子？

translation.en: Making cereal.
translation.zh: 冲麦片

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Why don't you pour me a bowl?
translation.zh: 是吗？给我也冲一碗

translation.en: Or don't pour me a bowl. Either way.
translation.zh: 不想冲也行，随你便

translation.en: I got it. I got it.
translation.zh: 我来弄我来弄，我来弄

translation.en: We can fix this.
translation.zh: 嘿嘿嘿，我们能处理

translation.en: It's not a big deal.
translation.zh: 嘿，没什么大不了的

translation.en: Look. See? See how quick it goes away?
translation.zh: 你看，看见了？ 不是一下子就弄好了吗？

translation.en: Crybaby, come on. Don't worry about it, boy.
translation.zh: 爱哭小子，行了 别担心，孩子

translation.en: Scuba Steve, damn you!
translation.zh: 史蒂夫蛙人，可恶！

translation.en: You think that's funny, me getting hurt?
translation.zh: 你喜欢这样？ 我弄疼了你觉得很有趣？

translation.en: There's a bright side to being up before 11: McDonald's breakfast.
translation.zh: 11点前起床也有好处 那就是可以去麦当劳吃早餐

translation.en: I haven't been up for that in 10 years. You wanna go?
translation.zh: 我差不多有十年没赶上早餐了 你想去吗？

translation.en: Tie your shoes, we'll go. Hurry.
translation.zh: 系好鞋带，我们去 动作快点

translation.en: It's like 12 blocks from here, so tie quickly.
translation.zh: 那儿离这12个街区，快点系

translation.en: Do you need help with that?
translation.zh: 需要我帮忙吗？

translation.en: I can do it.
translation.zh: 我能行！

translation.en: Let me do it.
translation.zh: 让我来吧！

translation.en: You loop it, you swoop it, and you pull.
translation.zh: 你看，做个圈绕个圈，再拉紧

translation.en: You loop it, you swoop it, you pull.
translation.zh: 做个圈，绕个圈，拉紧

translation.en: Good. Let's go. We're in a hurry.
translation.zh: 很好很好，好了 走吧，咱们得快点！

translation.en: It's different for your generation. You've always had McDonald's breakfast available.
translation.zh: 你们这代人和我们不一样 你们总能吃到麦当劳早餐

translation.en: I have?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: When I was born, all we had were the burgers and fries.
translation.zh: 是的是的，我生下来时 只能吃到汉堡和薯条

translation.en: Maybe the fish sandwich. I'm not sure. I'll get back to you.
translation.zh: 也许有鱼柳三明治，我不肯定 回去后我要查查资料

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, the hand-holding thing.
translation.zh: 对了，拉着你的手，走吧

translation.en: My dad took us to McDonald's the first morning they had breakfast.
translation.zh: 我记得麦当劳首次供应早餐时 我爸爸带我去

translation.en: Everybody was baffled. "Are these sausages or hamburgers?"
translation.zh: 餐厅里每个人都很困惑 他们都问这是香肠还是汉堡？

translation.en: I have to go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 我要上厕所

translation.en: We're gonna be there in a minute.
translation.zh: 什么？我们就要到了

translation.en: I gotta go now.
translation.zh: 我憋不住了

translation.en: Didn't you pee enough in bed?
translation.zh: 嘿！你不是在床上尿过了吗？

translation.en: We only got nine minutes to get there.
translation.zh: 我们必须，在9分钟内赶到那

translation.en: But I gotta go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 我就是要上厕所！

translation.en: All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好吧，我们走

translation.en: Can my kid use the bathroom for a minute?
translation.zh: 嘿 老兄 能让孩子用一下洗手间吗？

translation.en: Customers only.
translation.zh: 只供顾客使用

translation.en: He's just a kid. We'll be in and out.
translation.zh: 噢，只是小孩用一下 他憋不住了

translation.en: That's not my problem.
translation.zh: 不关我的事

translation.en: It's not your problem? All right.
translation.zh: 不关你的事！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 跟我来！

translation.en: I can't do it.
translation.zh: 我尿不出来

translation.en: What do you mean, you can't do it? Just go.
translation.zh: 怎么会呢？ 你说你要尿尿，快尿

translation.en: I'm scared. Could you do it too?
translation.zh: 我害怕，你能陪我尿吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧！

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 一起尿

translation.en: And we're off.
translation.zh: 预备开始

translation.en: That's not too difficult, right?
translation.zh: 一点都不难是吧？

translation.en: And we're both losing weight.
translation.zh: 我们体重都减轻了

translation.en: Good job. We're gonna miss breakfast. Let's go.
translation.zh: 干得好，好了 我们要赶不上早餐了！快走

translation.en: Put it away.
translation.zh: 裤子系好，很好

translation.en: -Thanks, anyways. -Sure thing. Anytime.
translation.zh: 嘿，谢谢你！ 欢迎随时光临！

translation.en: Move your ass there, pee-boy.
translation.zh: 快点走，小尿包 我们只有5分钟了

translation.en: We only got five minutes, five minutes. Now four.
translation.zh: 快点走，小尿包 我们只有5分钟了 5分钟！4分钟...

translation.en: Come on. We're almost there.
translation.zh: 快点，马上就要到了！

translation.en: Hey, mister. Why are you sitting on the ground?
translation.zh: 嘿先生，你为什么坐在地上？

translation.en: This is where I live.
translation.zh: 这是我住的地方，小伙子

translation.en: -We gotta get going. -Why?
translation.zh: 嘿，咱们得快点走 为什么？

translation.en: In retrospect, I made some bad choices after high school.
translation.zh: 回想起来，高中毕业后 我做些非常错误的决定

translation.en: -We gotta get going. -Why?
translation.zh: 咱们必须走了，朋友 为什么？

translation.en: This was during the so-called Disco Era...
translation.zh: 那是所谓的迪斯科时代

translation.en: ...but for me, it was more the Doing Mushrooms Era.
translation.zh: 可对我来说更是迷幻药时代

translation.en: -We're gonna miss breakfast. -Why?
translation.zh: 是的 咱们要错过早餐了 为什么？

translation.en: I never thought about that.
translation.zh: 我还真没认真想过这个问题

translation.en: I was never Mr. Popularity in high school...
translation.zh: 在高中时我不是个受欢迎的人

translation.en: ...and I watched Fantasia a lot.
translation.zh: 看了电影"幻想曲" 有一天我就下了决心

translation.en: -One day it clicked. -Hey, yappy.
translation.zh: 看了电影"幻想曲" 有一天我就下了决心 嘿雅皮，如果你结束谈话 我给你买个鸡蛋松饼

translation.en: If you end it, you get an Egg McMuffin.
translation.zh: 嘿雅皮，如果你结束谈话 我给你买个鸡蛋松饼

translation.en: How about a Sausage McMuffin with hash browns?
translation.zh: 我要香肠松饼加炸薯粒

translation.en: You got a deal.
translation.zh: 就这么定了

translation.en: Look, look. He fell asleep. Let's go.
translation.zh: 看看，他睡着了 我们走吧！

translation.en: Sausage McMuffin.
translation.zh: 香肠松饼

translation.en: Pardon me, sir.
translation.zh: 对不起，对不起

translation.en: How you doing?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: What can I get for you?
translation.zh: 嗨，欢迎光临麦当劳 你要些什么？

translation.en: -What do you want? -Cheerios.
translation.zh: 你要什么？ 要麦片

translation.en: They don't got Cheerios.
translation.zh: 麦片？这里没有，还要什么？

translation.en: Lasagna.
translation.zh: 意大利饼

translation.en: What's the matter? We'll take hotcakes and sausage.
translation.zh: 意大利饼？你这孩子咋回事？ 我们要，嗯，煎软饼和香肠

translation.en: Sorry. We stopped serving breakfast.
translation.zh: 对不起，先生 早餐时间已经过了

translation.en: We're four seconds late.
translation.zh: 你说什么呀？我们才晚了4秒

translation.en: You're 30 minutes and four seconds late. Breakfast stops at 10:30.
translation.zh: 不，你晚了30分零4秒 我们10点半就停止供应早餐

translation.en: Horseshit!
translation.zh: 真可恶！

translation.en: Don't cry. Sorry. I was cursing at the lady, not you.
translation.zh: 不不不，别哭，对不起 我不是骂你，是骂那个女人

translation.en: Nice parenting.
translation.zh: 真是好父亲

translation.en: Thanks. Are you my therapist? Take a walk.
translation.zh: 谢谢，你是我的心理医生？ 快滚开！

translation.en: Do you want a Happy Meal?
translation.zh: 要不要吃儿童快乐餐？

translation.en: You got a Happy Meal?
translation.zh: 有儿童快乐餐吗？

translation.en: Will somebody get the kid a Happy Meal?!
translation.zh: 谁给这孩子拿份儿童快乐餐？

translation.en: Relax.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Where's my Egg McMuffin?
translation.zh: 嘿，我的鸡蛋松饼在哪儿？

translation.en: Breakfast is over at 10:30.
translation.zh: 十点半就停止供应早餐了

translation.en: -Really? I thought it was 11. -I thought that too.
translation.zh: -真的？ -对！ -我以为是11点 -我也以为是

translation.en: Total mind blower.
translation.zh: 这可真没想到！

translation.en: Will you just relax? Here.
translation.zh: 别哭了好不好？ 说吧，你要我怎样做？

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 别哭了好不好？ 说吧，你要我怎样做？ 怎么样才能让你高兴？ 今晚你就要见到瓦妮莎了

translation.en: You're gonna meet Vanessa tonight. You'll like her.
translation.zh: 怎么样才能让你高兴？ 今晚你就要见到瓦妮莎了 你会喜欢她

translation.en: You wanna see me get hurt? That'll cheer you up?
translation.zh: 想看我受伤吗？ 我疼你会高兴？ 是

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 那好吧！

translation.en: You think that's funny?
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗？觉得好玩吗？

translation.en: Good. No more crying.
translation.zh: 很好，别再哭了

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧，先生？

translation.en: Next time, kill me.
translation.zh: 下次压死我算了

translation.en: Let's do it, Rangers.
translation.zh: 打败他们，骑兵

translation.en: ...it's as close as you can get to a must-win game for the Rangers.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: -How you doing? -How you doing?
translation.zh: -你好吗？ -你好吗？

translation.en: -You like hockey? -You like hockey?
translation.zh: 喜欢冰球吗？ 喜欢冰球吗？

translation.en: This is a big, important game.
translation.zh: 这是一场很重要的比赛

translation.en: This is a big, important game.
translation.zh: 这是一场很重要的比赛

translation.en: -Cut the crap. -Cut the crap.
translation.zh: 别胡闹了！ 别胡闹了！

translation.en: I'm serious. Don't do that.
translation.zh: 我是认真的，别这样

translation.en: I'm serious. Don't do that.
translation.zh: 我是认真的，别这样

translation.en: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck... ...if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.zh: 吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮 不吃葡萄倒吐葡萄皮...

translation.en: That's what I thought. Shut up.
translation.zh: 我就知道你没话说了，闭嘴

translation.en: Don't you take naps?
translation.zh: 嘿，你不睡午觉吗？

translation.en: Sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时睡

translation.en: Go take a nap.
translation.zh: 那你干嘛还不去睡？

translation.en: I'm too hungry to sleep.
translation.zh: 我太饿睡不着

translation.en: You want some food?
translation.zh: 你想吃东西？

translation.en: Having a kid is great...
translation.zh: 有孩子真好

translation.en: ...as long as his eyes are closed and he's not moving or speaking.
translation.zh: 只要他闭着眼睛不动不说话

translation.en: How you doing? You sleepwalking?
translation.zh: 嘿，你在干嘛孩子 在梦游？

translation.en: Why don't you go back sleepy? Sleepy.
translation.zh: 回去睡觉吧 去睡午觉继续睡

translation.en: Keep napping. What's this?
translation.zh: 回去睡觉吧 去睡午觉继续睡 -这是什么？ -袋鼠先生

translation.en: Kangaroo song.
translation.zh: -这是什么？ -袋鼠先生

translation.en: That's terrific. And we'll watch this after the game, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 很好 比赛结束 我们再看袋鼠先生好吗？

translation.en: But after my nap, I always watch the kangaroo song.
translation.zh: 可每次我睡醒午觉 都要看袋鼠先生

translation.en: It's overtime, and there's a penalty shot about to take place.
translation.zh: 现在是加时赛，马上就要罚球

translation.en: It happens every 10 years--
translation.zh: 这种事10年也碰不到一回

translation.en: Kangaroo song. Kangaroo song!
translation.zh: 袋鼠先生！袋鼠先生！

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 袋、鼠、先、生！ 好吧！

translation.en: God! You were normal yesterday.
translation.zh: 天啊，你昨天还挺正常

translation.en: I can't take this. Are you serious?
translation.zh: 我真受不了 你真的喜欢看这个？

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.zh: 我跳呀跳呀 整天蹦蹦跳跳

translation.en: Douche-bag kangaroo.
translation.zh: 粪袋袋鼠...

translation.en: Are you all hopped out?
translation.zh: 怎么不跳了？ 跳不动了？

translation.en: I don't know what to do. Hopefully Vanessa will.
translation.zh: 好吧，不知道怎样处理这个 希望瓦妮莎知道

translation.en: I think she's back. If she's not back, we'll wait for her.
translation.zh: 我想她该回来了 她要不回来 我们就等她 天哪，快点 去穿外套 弄干净

translation.en: Get your coat. Clean up.
translation.zh: 天哪，快点 去穿外套 弄干净

translation.en: Oh, God. You don't have to pee, do you?
translation.zh: 天哪，你不会半路上尿尿吧？

translation.en: -Do you swear? -I swear.
translation.zh: -不会 -你发誓？ 我发誓

translation.en: How come you're not going?
translation.zh: 你为什么不尿尿？

translation.en: I don't have to go. Only you and my grandfather go every 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 因为我不想尿！ 只有你和我 爷爷才每30秒尿一次

translation.en: Let's hurry it up, all right? I'm keeping you company.
translation.zh: 咱们快点好吗？我陪着你

translation.en: He'll write your name on the wall. Mind your business.
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？ 他会替你写墙上，别管闲事！

translation.en: Let's go. Let's go.
translation.zh: 快走！快走！快走！

translation.en: Why do I need to meet this lady?
translation.zh: 我为什么要见这位女士？

translation.en: -Now it is your problem. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 嘿，现在是你的事了！ 谢谢，谢谢

translation.en: She's that lady I was telling you about.
translation.zh: 她就是我跟你详过的那位女士

translation.en: She's gonna be a big part of your life.
translation.zh: 从现在起她也会成为 你生活中的一部分

translation.en: I'm scared. What if she's not nice?
translation.zh: 我害怕，要是她不好怎么办？

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: See these right here? These are magic sunglasses, okay?
translation.zh: 看见这个了？ 这是魔术太阳镜懂吗？

translation.en: If you're afraid, put them on to become invisible.
translation.zh: 如果你害怕就戴上它 你会变成隐形人

translation.en: Really? Nobody can see me?
translation.zh: 真的？没人能看见我？

translation.en: Put them on.
translation.zh: 戴上试试

translation.en: Sonny, I'm right here.
translation.zh: 嘿桑尼，我就在这儿！

translation.en: Oh, the glasses. I couldn't see you.
translation.zh: 戴了眼镜，我看不见你

translation.en: Keep those on. No one can notice you until you decide they can.
translation.zh: 你戴着它，没人会注意你 等你想让他们看见再摘下吧？

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -好的 -那好，我们走

translation.en: I'm still right here.
translation.zh: 我还在这儿呢！

translation.en: Okay, all right, the glasses.
translation.zh: 哦，都是眼镜搞的鬼

translation.en: Welcome back.
translation.zh: 欢迎回家

translation.en: -Who's that? -Who's who? He's invisible.
translation.zh: 那是谁？ 你说谁？ 他是隐形人！

translation.en: -Can I come in? -Sure.
translation.zh: 可以进去吗？ 当然

translation.en: Any invisible people out here... ...feel free to come in, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿，如果外面有隐形人 你也可以进来，好吗？

translation.en: Sonny, I don't really know what's going on right now.
translation.zh: 桑尼，我不知道现在该怎么办 不过，我们该坐下来好好谈谈

translation.en: -We should talk-- -You said I got some thinking to do?
translation.zh: 桑尼，我不知道现在该怎么办 不过，我们该坐下来好好谈谈 你说过有些事我必须想想 所以，我想过了

translation.en: So I did it.
translation.zh: 你说过有些事我必须想想 所以，我想过了

translation.en: Just because I don't have a job doesn't mean I don't wanna move on.
translation.zh: 我没有一份好工作，并不是说 我不愿意跨出人生的另一步

translation.en: Instead of saying that, I figured I'd show you.
translation.zh: 我觉得光说还不够 所以决定用行动表示

translation.en: -Before you say anything-- -Look at that.
translation.zh: 你开口说任何事之前 我想先告诉你

translation.en: He took his sunglasses off.
translation.zh: 你看，他把眼镜拿掉了

translation.en: He wants you to see him. He likes you.
translation.zh: 他想让你看见他 说明他喜欢你

translation.en: Julian, come here.
translation.zh: 朱利安过来吧

translation.en: Come here, pal.
translation.zh: 来这来，伙计

translation.en: Vanessa... ...I want you to meet Julian, my son.
translation.zh: 瓦妮莎，请认识一下朱利安 我的儿子

translation.en: Our son. I adopted him.
translation.zh: 我们的儿子，我领养了他

translation.en: I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 我不知道该说什么

translation.en: Don't say anything.
translation.zh: 你什么都不用说

translation.en: Is someone in the bathroom?
translation.zh: 卫生间里有人吗？

translation.en: Why is the door shut?
translation.zh: 那门为什么关着？

translation.en: -I don't know. -You don't?
translation.zh: 我不知道 不知道？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Sonny.
translation.zh: "我不知道"！ 桑尼...

translation.en: I can't believe this.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信...

translation.en: -Hey. Open up. -Sonny.
translation.zh: 嘿！开门！ 桑尼...

translation.en: Hello. Open the door!
translation.zh: 有人吗？把门打开！ 桑尼！

translation.en: -Is everything okay? -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 没出什么事吧？ 噢，天啊

translation.en: I'm sorry. I was freaking out there.
translation.zh: 对不起，我太冲动了 我，我是桑尼

translation.en: -I'm Sonny. -Sid.
translation.zh: 对不起，我太冲动了 我，我是桑尼 希德

translation.en: I had an attack of paranoia. I thought you were sleeping with my girl.
translation.zh: 希德，我简直是个妄想狂 刚才我以为你是我女友的情夫

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 我是

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 我是！

translation.en: That's what I was trying to tell you before. I found someone.
translation.zh: 桑尼，我刚才一直想要告诉你 我另外有人了

translation.en: -This old guy? -Sid.
translation.zh: 这个老头？ 希德！

translation.en: He's already achieved so much... ...and yet he's still goal-oriented and still focused.
translation.zh: 他已经很有成就了 但还继续奋斗，而且非常专注

translation.en: And he has a five-year plan.
translation.zh: 他有个5年计划

translation.en: What is it? "Don't die"?
translation.zh: 什么计划？"长生不死"？

translation.en: I can't believe this. We got a family now. This is what you wanted.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信！ 现在我们有家庭了 我以为这是你想要的

translation.en: You surprising me with a kid that you adopted...
translation.zh: 桑尼，你趁我不在时 跑去领养个孩子 想以此给我个惊喜 这不是我想要的

translation.en: -...wasn't what I wanted. -I did this for you.
translation.zh: 想以此给我个惊喜 这不是我想要的 我这都是为了你

translation.en: You wanted me to be more responsible. I can't raise this kid alone.
translation.zh: 你说我应该有责任感！ 我自己照顾不了他

translation.en: You remind me of my grandson. You don't think things through.
translation.zh: 你让我想起我的大孙子 做事从不好好考虑

translation.en: Hey, Old Man River, zip it or I'll break your hip.
translation.zh: 嘿，糟老头儿 把嘴闭上 不然我踢你屁股！

translation.en: -I'd like to see you try it. -Shut up.
translation.zh: 你踢个试试... 住口希德！

translation.en: How'd you misconstrue the situation so badly?
translation.zh: 你怎么把事情搞得一团糟？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Deep down you must've known this day was coming.
translation.zh: 走吧 其实你心里很清楚 早晚会有这一天

translation.en: You made the biggest mistake of your life.
translation.zh: 你在犯你这一生中 最大的错误 宝贝

translation.en: I know you'll be missing me when you got... ...that big, white, wrinkly... ...body on top of you...
translation.zh: 我知道你和那个 白胡子白头皮肤松垮的老头

translation.en: ...with his loose skin... ...and old balls. Gross.
translation.zh: 上床时一定会想念我！ 你真让我恶心！

translation.en: Excuse me. How you doing? I'm Kevin Gerrity.
translation.zh: 打扰了，你好吗？ 我是凯文盖瑞蒂

translation.en: I got an emergency problem. Is Arthur Brooks around?
translation.zh: 我有点急事和这孩子有关 阿瑟布鲁克斯先生在吗？

translation.en: I'll go get him for you.
translation.zh: 是的，我马上找他来

translation.en: Stay where I can see you. I gotta talk to this guy.
translation.zh: 你，你能不能在那儿坐一会 别离开我的视线 我要和这个人谈点事

translation.en: Mr. Gerrity? -Arthur Brooks. -How are you?
translation.zh: 盖瑞蒂先生？ 嗨，我是布鲁克斯，你好吗？

translation.en: I need to speak with you.
translation.zh: 很好 啊，我需要和你谈谈

translation.en: I didn't tell you to come here, did I? I was gonna mail you the paperwork.
translation.zh: 我没让你到办公室来，对吗？ 我很快会把办手续文件寄给你

translation.en: It's like the opposite of that. Look, I can't manage this kid.
translation.zh: 不，其实，正好相反 你看，我不能照顾这孩子

translation.en: I ain't a good father. I made a big mistake.
translation.zh: 我不是个好父亲 我犯了一个大错误

translation.en: -Mistake? -I had a mother lined up for him...
translation.zh: 错误？ 我本来给他准备了一个母亲 可是她跟别人跑了

translation.en: ...but she's banging the Pepperidge Farm guy.
translation.zh: 我本来给他准备了一个母亲 可是她跟别人跑了

translation.en: The kid won't stop peeing and throwing up.
translation.zh: 还有这孩子不停上厕所 呕吐 像头英国小猎犬

translation.en: He's like a cocker spaniel. I just....
translation.zh: 还有这孩子不停上厕所 呕吐 像头英国小猎犬 我想他最好还是跟着亲生母亲

translation.en: He'd be better off with his natural mother.
translation.zh: 我想他最好还是跟着亲生母亲

translation.en: Well, she passed away last night, Mr. Gerrity.
translation.zh: 他母亲昨晚去世了 盖瑞蒂先生

translation.en: She had cancer. She must have sensed... ...that her time was running short.
translation.zh: 她患了癌症 她一定是知道自己时间不多了

translation.en: She wanted her son to be with the natural father.
translation.zh: 所以才想让儿子跟着亲生父亲 这合情合理

translation.en: Loop. Pull.
translation.zh: 做个圈，绕个圈

translation.en: If you don't wanna take care of him...
translation.zh: 如果你不想照顾朱利安 我们可以收留他

translation.en: ...we'll take him. But he'll have to chill in a group home.
translation.zh: 但我必须告诉你 他得在大家庭里待上一段时间

translation.en: Group home? Like an orphanage?
translation.zh: 大家庭？那是什么？ 像孤儿院？

translation.en: We don't call them that.
translation.zh: 对，只是现在不这么叫了

translation.en: Look, I did it. Loop, swoop and pull.
translation.zh: 你看我成功了 做个圈，绕个圈，这么一拉

translation.en: You did do it. Congratulations, kid.
translation.zh: 哇，你会系鞋带了 祝贺你，孩子

translation.en: I showed him that.
translation.zh: 是我教他的

translation.en: Why don't you go back over there, okay?
translation.zh: 回去乖乖地坐在那，好吗？

translation.en: -I'll call the Heatherton Home-- -Let's do this.
translation.zh: 我给希斯顿儿童之家打电话 别，要不这样吧 我暂时照顾这孩子

translation.en: I'll hang on to the kid until you find him a new family.
translation.zh: 别，要不这样吧 我暂时照顾这孩子 等你给他找个领养家庭

translation.en: I don't know. I gotta watch out for the kid's best interest.
translation.zh: 我说不好 我是说我得顾及孩子最大利益 你自己说你是个不称职的父亲

translation.en: You said yourself you were a bogus dad.
translation.zh: 我是说我得顾及孩子最大利益 你自己说你是个不称职的父亲

translation.en: He's better off with me than in an orphanage.
translation.zh: 可是，他跟着我 总比进孤儿院好一些

translation.en: I don't wanna put him in a home any more than you do.
translation.zh: 我和你一样 不想把他送进大家庭

translation.en: Why don't we pretend you didn't even come in here?
translation.zh: 要不我们就当你今天 根本没来过这里，好吗？

translation.en: I'll give you a shout when I line up a family.
translation.zh: 我一找到领养家庭 就给你打电话，好吗？

translation.en: -That's good. -Later.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Just don't make me regret this.
translation.zh: 你不要让我后悔

translation.en: Where are we going now?
translation.zh: 咱们现在去哪儿？

translation.en: I gotta make a phone call. Just stay right here, all right?
translation.zh: 我要打个电话 呆在这儿别乱跑，行吗？

translation.en: -This is a collect call from: -Your baby boy.
translation.zh: 这个对方付费电话来自... 你的小儿子

translation.en: -To accept charges, say, "Yes." -Yeah, I'll accept.
translation.zh: 同意付费请回答"是" 是，我同意

translation.en: Dad, how's it going? How's Florida?
translation.zh: 嘿爸爸，你好吗？ 佛罗里达怎么样？

translation.en: Not too bad. Your mother got a sunburn playing tennis.
translation.zh: 这里不错 你妈妈昨天打网球 皮肤晒红了一块

translation.en: -I got some interesting news. -Oh, yeah? What?
translation.zh: 我要告诉你一个好消息 哦是吗？是什么？

translation.en: Kind of adopted a kid.
translation.zh: 我领养了一个小孩

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你在胡说些什么？

translation.en: I'm talking about you being a grandfather.
translation.zh: 我是说你当爷爷了，恭喜你！

translation.en: Who the hell would give you a kid?
translation.zh: 什么人会把孩子给你？

translation.en: Social Services.
translation.zh: 社会福利部

translation.en: You idiot. You better give that kid back.
translation.zh: 你这白痴！快把孩子退回去

translation.en: His mother's.... Hang on.
translation.zh: 他妈妈...等一下

translation.en: Go play with them pigeons, buddy.
translation.zh: 去和鸽子玩，伙计

translation.en: I tried to give him back. I just can't. All right?
translation.zh: 我是想把他退回去 可我就是 做不到，爸爸你明白吗？

translation.en: I need your help.
translation.zh: 我需要你的帮助 我现在的情况很不好

translation.en: I'm in a bad way. Vanessa dumped me. I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 我需要你的帮助 我现在的情况很不好 瓦妮莎抛弃了我 我不知道我现在在做什么

translation.en: You're damn right.
translation.zh: 对 你当然不知自己在干嘛！

translation.en: The kid is always around. He never leaves me alone.
translation.zh: 这孩子总缠着我 过去三天里他一直跟着我

translation.en: You'd think he'd want some privacy. I'm in deep shit.
translation.zh: 你以为他需要私人空间 可他不，我真是倒了大霉

translation.en: Give that kid back before you ruin both your lives.
translation.zh: 把孩子退回去 趁你还没毁掉 两个人的生活

translation.en: I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 噢，多谢你的鼓励，爸爸

translation.en: He's better off living in a dumpster.
translation.zh: 他住收容所也比跟你住强

translation.en: I'll be a better father than you!
translation.zh: 我会做个好父亲，比你好！

translation.en: Impossible! All you care about is yourself!
translation.zh: 这不可能 因为你只在乎你自己！

translation.en: Yeah? No, I care about you saving money on this call!
translation.zh: 是吗？不 我在乎你为这个电话付钱！

translation.en: Let's eat.
translation.zh: 走，吃饭去

translation.en: The Vanessa thing did not work out.
translation.zh: 我们不能指望瓦妮莎了

translation.en: She lost her damn mind. That wasn't your fault, though, okay?
translation.zh: 她丧失了理智 这不是你的错，明白吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: I know when you first got here...
translation.zh: 我知道你刚来的时候 以为能见到你爸爸

translation.en: ...you thought you were gonna meet your dad.
translation.zh: 我知道你刚来的时候 以为能见到你爸爸 可是伙计，我得告诉你 我想这事希望不大

translation.en: But I don't think that's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 可是伙计，我得告诉你 我想这事希望不大

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know.
translation.zh: 为什么？ 我不知道为什么

translation.en: But, buddy, real dads aren't always that great.
translation.zh: 但是，伙计，要知道 亲生爸爸不一定都那么好

translation.en: I got one and he's out of his mind.
translation.zh: 我有爸爸，但他的脑子有毛病

translation.en: He tells me what to do. He never lets me figure stuff out on my own.
translation.zh: 我这辈子干什么他都要管 从来不让我自己思考人生

translation.en: A lot of dads are like that. That's why people grow up nuts.
translation.zh: 很多爸爸都是这样 所以很多大人都是疯子

translation.en: Look at this guy.
translation.zh: 你看那边的那个人

translation.en: He was probably a nice boy like you. Then his dad messed his mind up.
translation.zh: 他小时候可能像你这么乖 可他爸爸把他逼疯了 现在成了这样子

translation.en: Who won the Jets game?
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计，比赛谁赢了？ 你知道吗？

translation.en: Who cares?
translation.zh: 谁在乎！

translation.en: Let it go. He can't control you anymore.
translation.zh: 别理你爸，他不能再控制你了

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你胡说八道些什么？

translation.en: -You know. -You're a loser.
translation.zh: 你知道我的意思 对，你是个废物！

translation.en: You're mad at your dad, not at me! I forgive you!
translation.zh: 你在生你老爸的气 我不介意！

translation.en: I am. I am. I hate my father.
translation.zh: 是的，是的，我恨我爸爸

translation.en: I don't want it to be like that. I don't wanna control you.
translation.zh: 我不想成为那个样子 我不想控制你，朱利安

translation.en: -You even like your name? -I guess.
translation.zh: 你喜欢这名字吗，朱利安？ 可能吧

translation.en: You guess? Shouldn't you like your name?
translation.zh: 可能？ 一个人怎能不喜欢 自己的名字？

translation.en: It'll be your name the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 为什么不能自己选个名字？ 它要跟随你一辈子

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.zh: 你喜欢叫什么名字？

translation.en: Frankenstein.
translation.zh: 弗兰肯斯坦

translation.en: I can deal with that. I'll call you Frankenstein.
translation.zh: 那个科学怪人？好，我不介意 我可以叫你弗兰肯斯坦

translation.en: Frankenstein, you gonna play in the puddle?
translation.zh: 你干嘛 弗兰肯斯坦？ 想到水坑玩泥巴？

translation.en: Go ahead. From now on, you do whatever you wanna do.
translation.zh: 那就去吧，玩个痛快 从现在开始，你可以随心所欲

translation.en: I'll show you some cool shit along the way.
translation.zh: 我还能教你一些很酷的把戏

translation.en: That's what it's all about.
translation.zh: 这就是人生！

translation.en: Stay in front of it. Don't be scared.
translation.zh: 站直了迎着球，别害怕

translation.en: It's coming right at you.
translation.zh: 我们开始了 它冲着你去了

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 好，不错！

translation.en: You're picking your head up. Don't do that.
translation.zh: 你得把头抬起来 别这么做

translation.en: Is this okay?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: That's what you wanna wear?
translation.zh: 你想这样穿吗？

translation.en: That's okay with me then.
translation.zh: 我没什么意见

translation.en: Good luck walking down the street.
translation.zh: 只希望你上街时有好运 我只能这么说

translation.en: Way to block it. Stay with it.
translation.zh: 干的好，继续加油！

translation.en: You're the next Willie Randolph.
translation.zh: 你就是第二个威利兰道夫 你记住这话

translation.en: Chief Jay Strongbow used to do a sleeper hold.
translation.zh: 就是这个人 绰号强弓乔伊长官 他总是用这招使对手昏睡过去

translation.en: Put your arm under here.
translation.zh: 把你的胳膊放在这

translation.en: Lift this arm, okay? Slide under and try to lock wrists.
translation.zh: 抬起另一只胳膊 滑下去扼住他的手腕

translation.en: Let me show you. Watch.
translation.zh: 我做给你看，看，看

translation.en: Throw him into the ropes and he comes back....
translation.zh: 把他摔在围绳上 他弹回来

translation.en: Get him. Get him. Lock him up. Lock wrists.
translation.zh: 抓住他 让他动弹不得 抓住手腕

translation.en: You bring him down slow. Apply pressure.
translation.zh: 好，慢慢把他放倒 慢点，加大压力

translation.en: He's going to sleep now.
translation.zh: 他马上就要睡着了

translation.en: See, he's out.
translation.zh: 看，他睡着了

translation.en: Wake up.
translation.zh: 醒一醒

translation.en: You'll be the only kid your age with a slingshot.
translation.zh: 你是唯一这么小 就能玩弹弓的孩子，我保证

translation.en: Go have some fun. Shoot a few beer cans or something.
translation.zh: 去玩吧 射几个啤酒罐什么的，明白吗

translation.en: You like that?
translation.zh: 喜欢吗？

translation.en: Sonny, Sonny, come here!
translation.zh: 桑尼，桑尼，快过来！

translation.en: What is it? What's the matter?
translation.zh: 怎么了？出了什么事？

translation.en: Let me have that.
translation.zh: 把弹弓给我

translation.en: Go to your room. I think. Or do whatever you want.
translation.zh: 回你房间去 或者干点别的 随便什么

translation.en: It's gonna be fun. You nervous?
translation.zh: 一定会很好玩，你紧张吗？

translation.en: No? You're excited, aren't you?
translation.zh: 不？你很兴奋对吧

translation.en: Let's go. Up, up, up.
translation.zh: 跟我来，上上上来

translation.en: Here comes some candy.
translation.zh: 好，会有人给你糖

translation.en: How you doing?
translation.zh: 嗨，你好啊？

translation.en: Happy Halloween! We got a first-timer.
translation.zh: 万圣节快乐！孩子第一次玩 "不给糖就捣乱"

translation.en: Do the right thing, buddy. We want some candy!
translation.zh: 按规矩办，老兄 我们要些糖果！

translation.en: Hang on right here for a second. Don't move.
translation.zh: 你在这儿等我好吗？ 别乱跑

translation.en: Yeah, that's it.
translation.zh: 对，这才像话

translation.en: Yeah, CDs. You like that?
translation.zh: 不错，激光唱片 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: He's not happy. What else you got?
translation.zh: 他还是不高兴，你还有什么？

translation.en: Okay, that's good. Trick-or-treat.
translation.zh: 噢对，这个不错 不给糖就捣乱

translation.en: -Say, "Happy Halloween." -Happy Halloween.
translation.zh: 说"万圣节快乐" 万圣节快乐

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Next year, be prepared, moron.
translation.zh: 明年要提前准备好，白痴！

translation.en: What's with the cummerbund?
translation.zh: 那孩子怎么戴着宽腰带？

translation.en: I let him wear whatever he wants.
translation.zh: 他想穿什么我就让他穿什么

translation.en: Those boots are the best.
translation.zh: 那靴子质量上乘，是谁的？

translation.en: I think they're Kevin's.
translation.zh: 不知道，好吧，我想是凯文的

translation.en: I'll have a hot dog with the mustard and a knish.
translation.zh: 我要热狗加芥末外加炸面饼

translation.en: Frankenstein, what do you want?
translation.zh: 弗兰肯斯坦，你要什么？

translation.en: Thirty packets of ketchup.
translation.zh: 30包番茄酱

translation.en: All right. Thirty packets of ketchup.
translation.zh: 好的，30包番茄酱

translation.en: Nice cut, pal.
translation.zh: 耶，动作漂亮

translation.en: Frankenstein. Do that thing I taught you the other day.
translation.zh: 弗兰肯斯坦 给他们的看我教你的那招

translation.en: It took him 20 minutes to learn that. He's quick. He's smart.
translation.zh: 真厉害！ 他学这招用了大约20分钟 真不可思议！他很机灵，聪明

translation.en: -And he loves ketchup. -He does.
translation.zh: 他喜欢番茄酱 是的，我在做的是一种全新的 教育孩子的方法

translation.en: This is a whole new school of child raising.
translation.zh: 是的，我在做的是一种全新的 教育孩子的方法

translation.en: You give him options, not orders. Let him make the decision.
translation.zh: 给孩子多种选择 而不是限制命令 让他自己做出正确决定

translation.en: You're a pioneer.
translation.zh: 你是个先驱

translation.en: -So you two just chill out all day? -Basically.
translation.zh: 你们每天在一起这么混日子？ 差不多吧

translation.en: Hung out on the monkey bars. The kid did eight chin-ups.
translation.zh: 昨天去公园玩爬杠 这孩子能做8个引体向上

translation.en: I can't even do one with these scrawny arms.
translation.zh: 8个？ 我这干柴胳膊连一个都做不了

translation.en: They're not scrawny. They're nice.
translation.zh: 它们不是干柴，它们很棒

translation.en: What do you wanna do tomorrow?
translation.zh: 谢谢 朱利安，你明天想干什么？

translation.en: I wanna go to school.
translation.zh: 我想去上学

translation.en: I don't force him, he makes the right decision. Way to go.
translation.zh: 看看，我没有强迫他 他自己作出正确决定！ 是个好孩子！ 星期一送你去上学好吗？

translation.en: We'll enroll you on Monday. Enjoy the weekend.
translation.zh: 是个好孩子！ 星期一送你去上学好吗？ 让我们尽情享受周末

translation.en: Do the thing again.
translation.zh: 再给我们来一次！

translation.en: That one touched the ground.
translation.zh: 这次碰到地了 这次碰着地了

translation.en: That was awesome!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: Good job.
translation.zh: 干得好

translation.en: Help me! Help me!
translation.zh: 救救我！救救我！ 救救我！

translation.en: Please help me. I don't know where I live.
translation.zh: 请帮帮我 我不知道住在哪儿

translation.en: This isn't a big problem. We'll find your parents.
translation.zh: 这不是大问题 只要... 我们会找到你父母

translation.en: -What's your name? -Frankenstein.
translation.zh: 你叫什么？ 弗兰肯斯坦

translation.en: -Frankenstein. Okay. -There you are.
translation.zh: 弗兰肯斯坦？好 你在这儿？

translation.en: There you are. Are you okay, buddy?
translation.zh: 你在这儿！ 你没事吧孩子？

translation.en: I turn my head and he disappeared.
translation.zh: 我刚一回头没注意 他就不见了

translation.en: Don't you ever do that to me again. Don't do that.
translation.zh: 不许再这样了好吗？ 别再乱跑了！

translation.en: Thank you for being sweet to my little boy.
translation.zh: 谢谢你对我的孩子这么好

translation.en: -You're welcome, Sonny. -Sonny?
translation.zh: 别客气，桑尼 桑尼？

translation.en: I think my sister, Corinne, is engaged to your roommate.
translation.zh: 我想我妹妹科琳娜 跟你的室友订婚了

translation.en: Your sister's Corinne? That sucks.
translation.zh: 你是科琳娜的姐姐？ 那太糟糕了！

translation.en: Yeah, I'm up from D.C. I was at that party...
translation.zh: 是啊，我从华盛顿赶来 那天晚上我也在

translation.en: ...where we wasted the good surprise on you.
translation.zh: 你浪费了我们惊喜的那个晚会

translation.en: Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 是的，真对不起

translation.en: So, what, you have a son now?
translation.zh: 这么说你有儿子了？

translation.en: I'm not his dad. I'm more of a father-figure type...
translation.zh: 我不是他的亲生父亲 只能算是个临时爸爸

translation.en: ...until Social Services can get another family.
translation.zh: 直到社会福利部 为他找到合适的领养人

translation.en: At which point, you'll find a new way... ...to initiate conversations with girls in the park.
translation.zh: 在这段时间里你找到了 在公园和姑娘搭话的新方法？

translation.en: Yeah, that's correct.
translation.zh: 对，是这样的

translation.en: Good job, buddy!
translation.zh: 干得好，伙计！

translation.en: He's peeing on his own.
translation.zh: 他能自己尿尿

translation.en: Keep it flowing! That's it!
translation.zh: 接着尿，就是这样！

translation.en: Go! Go!
translation.zh: 尿吧！尿吧！

translation.en: So does Corinne's sister have a name?
translation.zh: 科琳娜的姐姐有名字吗？

translation.en: -It's Layla. -Layla? I like your song.
translation.zh: 她叫莱拉 莱拉？ 我喜欢你的名字

translation.en: Could you do me a favor? Could you hang out with me?
translation.zh: 能帮我个大忙吗？ 今晚能不能和我在一起？

translation.en: He'll think he's a failure if he couldn't get me a date.
translation.zh: 我不想让这孩子认为他失败了 因为没能帮我约到姑娘

translation.en: I really can't.
translation.zh: 我真的不行

translation.en: I have a ton of work to do.
translation.zh: -不行？ -是的，我还有很多工作要做

translation.en: I see. Hang on a second.
translation.zh: 明白了，请等一会

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 快过来

translation.en: Layla, if you don't come over to Sonny's apartment tonight...
translation.zh: 莱拉，如果今晚 你不来桑尼家的话

translation.en: ...there's a good chance I'll develop a stutter.
translation.zh: 我很可能会变成结巴

translation.en: P-P-P-Please don't do this to me.
translation.zh: 请请...请不要这样对我

translation.en: -That is so cheap. -What?
translation.zh: 这个小鬼头 什么？

translation.en: So I'm working in a tollbooth now.
translation.zh: 对，我目前在公路收费站工作

translation.en: I originally wanted to be a male model...
translation.zh: 我最早的愿望是当男模特 可是...

translation.en: ...but I'm not very good-looking, so that didn't work out.
translation.zh: 不幸我长得不够漂亮 所以没当成

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.zh: 听你这么说我很难过

translation.en: I'm all right. I'm recovering.
translation.zh: 我没事 已从打击中恢复过来了

translation.en: This is my favorite part of the song right here.
translation.zh: 这是我最喜欢的歌词

translation.en: Better keep it down low. The kid's gonna wake up.
translation.zh: 如果我无法得到你 最好小声一点 会把孩子吵醒

translation.en: Sonny!
translation.zh: 桑尼！

translation.en: Too late.
translation.zh: 太晚了

translation.en: Okay. Just hang out a little bit. I'll be right back. Don't go sneaking out.
translation.zh: 好吧，你等我一会好吗？ 我马上回来，不许偷偷溜走

translation.en: -What are you doing? -You forgot to say good night.
translation.zh: 你怎么了？ 你忘了说"晚安"

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？真的吗？

translation.en: I can't go to sleep until you say good night.
translation.zh: 你不说晚安我就睡不着

translation.en: I didn't know that. I'm sorry. Good night.
translation.zh: 这我不知道，对不起 晚安！

translation.en: Go to sleep now, all right?
translation.zh: 现在睡吧，好吗？

translation.en: What'd we learn about girls?
translation.zh: 关于姑娘 今天我们学会了什么？

translation.en: Initiating the conversation is half the battle.
translation.zh: 和姑娘搭上话是成功的一半

translation.en: Bingo. Now sleep, okay?
translation.zh: 对了！快睡觉吧

translation.en: I gave him NyQuil. He should be out for the night.
translation.zh: 我给他喝了咳嗽药水 应该能熟睡一整夜

translation.en: This is Styx. They've been my favorite band since I was 12.
translation.zh: 这是冥河 对 他们一直是我最喜欢的乐队 从我12岁开始

translation.en: You're kidding me.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑？

translation.en: No, I can't help it. I just love them.
translation.zh: 不，真的！ 没办法我就是喜欢他们

translation.en: My friends make fun of me.
translation.zh: 我朋友常拿这个笑话我

translation.en: My friends make fun of me too. I've seen them 25 times.
translation.zh: 我朋友也常拿这个笑话我 我看他们演出有25次

translation.en: Tommy Shaw, when I was 16, I was at the concert...
translation.zh: 我16岁时去看他们的演唱会 吉它手汤姆肖从台上抓住我手

translation.en: ...and he reached down, pulled me on stage.
translation.zh: 把我拉上台

translation.en: -I did the robot voice for "Mr. Roboto." -Really?
translation.zh: 他们唱机器人时 让我学机器人 真的？

translation.en: No, I made that up. I'm sorry. That would've been cool, right?
translation.zh: 不，我瞎编的，对不起 不过那样真的很酷，对吗？

translation.en: My cousin's friends with their drummer...
translation.zh: -对 -对，我表弟的朋友认识鼓手

translation.en: ...so when they come to town, we go to dinner...
translation.zh: 所以每次他来演出 我们都要和他们共进晚餐

translation.en: ...and they tell us stories from the road.
translation.zh: 他们常给我们讲一路上的见闻

translation.en: -Really? -No, I made that up again too.

translation.en: Peanuts?

translation.en: The peanuts belonged to a squirrel...

translation.en: And then the rabbit thought to himself...

translation.en: ..."Carrots, peanuts, what's the difference?"

translation.en: So he asked the squirrel if he could have some.

translation.en: And the squirrel said, "Of course."

translation.en: And the rabbit was very happy to make such a nice new friend.

translation.en: And so was the squirrel.

translation.en: And the rabbit thought the squirrel had pretty hair.

translation.en: And nice eyes also.

translation.en: And the squirrel thought the rabbit was really nice too.

translation.en: And then, the rabbit worked up his courage...

translation.en: ...and asked the squirrel if he could have... ...just the littlest squirrel kiss.

translation.en: And the squirrel thought it just wasn't the right time...

translation.en: ...in her busy squirrel life to be kissing any rabbits...

translation.en: ...even though this particular rabbit was very sweet.

translation.en: And the rabbit got shut down, did he?

translation.en: That's all right. But he was still thinking maybe...

translation.en: ...Scuba Steve could get a squirrel kiss...

translation.en: ...so somebody's getting some action.
translation.zh: 这样至少有人 能有这个艳福

translation.en: Is he picking your nose?

translation.en: I got a two, a four, a 10, an eight and a six.
I don't understand. Why do you win?

translation.en: I'll get it!

translation.en: Ix-nay on the ketchup-nay.

translation.en: My body's definitely better than his.

translation.en: Without question.

translation.en: I know. I'm excited.

translation.en: I guess ever since I was a little girl.

translation.en: See, my mom got married really young and pretty much just raised us kids.

translation.en: So when my dad took off... ...she wasn't left with a lot of options.

translation.en: I guess I feel like I gotta kick ass while there's ass to be kicked.

translation.en: ...when I'm not with you, I'm thinking of you. Do you have that going on?

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许

translation.en: Maybe we should try a kiss out.

translation.en: We owe it to ourselves to see if we should move to the next level.
