translation.en: I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Me either. It's just that you kissed Scuba Steve.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 自从你亲了史蒂夫蛙人

translation.en: Ever since then, he's strutted around bragging...
translation.zh: 他就在我家趾高气扬地 到处炫耀

translation.en: ..."I got a kiss the first night. After three times, you got nothing."
translation.zh: 他就在我家趾高气扬地 到处炫耀 "第一晚我就得到一个吻" 你和她约会3次一无所获

translation.en: -He said that? -Come on.
translation.zh: 他真的这么说？

translation.en: Let's just give it a shot just so I can have some dignity. All right?
translation.zh: 求你了，我们试试 至少让我 在家里有点自尊，好吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Gross!
translation.zh: 真恶心！

translation.en: Did I witness the first kiss?
translation.zh: 我是不是看到你们的初吻？

translation.en: Yeah, you did. Thanks a lot for showing up.
translation.zh: 对， 科琳娜 谢谢你的出现

translation.en: Layla, you didn't actually enjoy that, did you?
translation.zh: 莱拉，你不会真的喜欢吧？

translation.en: I don't know. I'm going upstairs.
translation.zh: 我不知道，我要上去了

translation.en: Wash your mouth out. He's dirty. And he's poor.
translation.zh: 洗洗嘴巴，他很脏，而且很穷

translation.en: What do you got in the bag, Corinne? Some chicken wings? Booby tassels?
translation.zh: 你们包里装的什么，科琳娜？ 炸鸡翅膀？和丰乳霜？

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: You have a good sleep.
translation.zh: 祝你睡个好觉，科琳娜

translation.en: Pleasant Hooters.
translation.zh: 快乐的女招待

translation.en: Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 快点！快点！

translation.en: This is where we hang our jackets. This is my hook.
translation.zh: 这是我们挂外套的地方 这是我的钩子

translation.en: That's a capertillar.
translation.zh: -非常好 -这是帽帽虫

translation.en: A caterpillar.
translation.zh: 帽帽虫？

translation.en: -That's right, a capertillar. -Capertillar, all right.
translation.zh: 没错，就是帽帽虫 是毛毛虫，好吧

translation.en: -Staying clean, pal? -Yes.
translation.zh: 嘿，没还好吧，伙计？

translation.en: You drink the booze, you lose. Remember that, punk.
translation.zh: -是的 -这就对了，喝酒会失去理智 别忘了，小家伙

translation.en: I'm Julian's teacher, Ms. Foote.
translation.zh: -嗨！ -嗨！ 我是朱利安的老师，福特女士 你是他父亲？

translation.en: -You his father? -I'm Kevin Gerrity.
translation.zh: 我是朱利安的老师，福特女士 你是他父亲？ 是，你好吗？ 我叫凯文盖瑞蒂

translation.en: Do you have some time to go over some things...
translation.zh: 不知能不能和你谈几分钟？ 朱利安有些事令我有些不安

translation.en: -...that have been bothering me? -Sure.
translation.zh: 不知能不能和你谈几分钟？ 朱利安有些事令我有些不安 当然

translation.en: Go take a walk, pal.
translation.zh: 去随便走走

translation.en: Julian has been displaying some odd behavior.
translation.zh: 朱利安表现出一些奇怪的行为

translation.en: He spilled glue on the floor and didn't tell anyone.
translation.zh: 上星期不小心把胶水洒在地上 他不告诉任何人

translation.en: He covered it with newspaper.
translation.zh: 用报纸把它盖住

translation.en: And then one of our students wore Rollerblades for show-and-tell.
translation.zh: 我们有个学生穿滑轮鞋表演

translation.en: And Julian tripped him with a stick.
translation.zh: 朱利安用棍子将他绊倒！

translation.en: I've never--
translation.zh: 我从来没...

translation.en: Julian found it hilarious.
translation.zh: 朱利安觉得很好笑！

translation.en: I like him to express himself freely.
translation.zh: 我喜欢让他自由 表达自己的感觉

translation.en: I've really never seen any problems with that.
translation.zh: 我没有发现这有什么问题

translation.en: Your boy's making the least progress of any of the children.
translation.zh: 在班里你儿子的进步 比其他孩子都慢

translation.en: Frankly, his personal hygiene is becoming a cause for concern.
translation.zh: 还有坦白地说 他的个人卫生实在令人担忧

translation.en: He's the smelly kid in class? I let him become the smelly kid?
translation.zh: 他是班上最臭的孩子？ 我竟让他成为班上最臭的孩子

translation.en: What's wrong with me?
translation.zh: 我究竟出了啥问题？

translation.en: I've had some smelly ones before.
translation.zh: 是的，以前我也教过一些 名声很臭的孩子

translation.en: But your son is by far the smelliest.
translation.zh: 但你儿子可以说是最臭的！

translation.en: All right, I got you. What do you think I should do?
translation.zh: 好的，我知道了，女士 别着急，你说我该怎么做？

translation.en: Start by paying more attention to his schoolwork.
translation.zh: -你可以从关心他的功课开始 -好的

translation.en: The class is giving a presentation of the Founding Fathers.
translation.zh: 两星期后班里要举办 美国历史伟人的表演

translation.en: Julian has drawn the part of Benjamin Franklin, a very important role.
translation.zh: 朱利安抽签扮演 本杰明弗兰克林 一个很重要的角色 你应该想法帮助他

translation.en: Do what you can to help.
translation.zh: 一个很重要的角色 你应该想法帮助他

translation.en: I will turn this all around. That's a promise.
translation.zh: 好的，我会解决所有问题 我向你保证

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: Stinky, let's go. You got us in trouble.
translation.zh: 臭孩子，咱们走吧 你惹出大麻烦了

translation.en: Did he call him "Stinky"?
translation.zh: 他叫他臭孩子？

translation.en: Wow, I didn't know this about George Washington.
translation.zh: 哇，乔治华盛顿的这些事 连我也不知道

translation.en: Yes, his teeth were made of wool.
translation.zh: 对，他的牙是布头做的

translation.en: Wood.
translation.zh: 木头

translation.en: I sorry. I mix up "D" and "L."
translation.zh: 哦 对不起 我把汉语拼音 B和M弄混了

translation.en: Well, get it right.
translation.zh: 别总念错字

translation.en: Turn that game off, pal.
translation.zh: 把游戏机关掉吧，伙计？

translation.en: I got four guys left.
translation.zh: 我还得杀掉4个人

translation.en: Let's study a little bit.
translation.zh: 好了，我们一块学习

translation.en: I don't wanna study.
translation.zh: 我不想学习

translation.en: Give me that.
translation.zh: 把它给我！

translation.en: -You just killed me. -So what? You'll play later.
translation.zh: 你要害死我啊 那又怎么样？ 放心，你可以等会儿再玩

translation.en: You can't tell me what to do.
translation.zh: 你不能要求我做任何事

translation.en: Really? Let's take a vote. Who thinks the kid should study?
translation.zh: 是吗？要不我们投票 谁认为孩子应该学习？

translation.en: Who doesn't? Well, you just lost, two to one.
translation.zh: 谁不赞成？ 你输了，二比一

translation.en: It's a tie. That guy doesn't count. He can't even read.
translation.zh: 不，是平局 那家伙不算，他根本不识字

translation.en: I know. He was just joking around.
translation.zh: 我知道，知道，他只是开玩笑

translation.en: Can you hang out here a little bit? I gotta go do something.
translation.zh: 听着，你在这多呆一会好吗？ 我有点事要办

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 去吧，没问题

translation.en: Would you like
translation.zh: 来跟我一起玩

translation.en: We'll hop, hop, hop, hop
translation.zh: 我们跳啊跳唱啊啊

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.zh: 你看怎么样？

translation.en: Get the door.
translation.zh: 去开门！

translation.en: Hi, Julian. How you doing?
translation.zh: 嗨，朱利安，你好吗？

translation.en: I'm Scuba Sam. Scuba Steve's father.
translation.zh: 我是山姆蛙人 史蒂夫蛙人的爸爸

translation.en: You see, my boy... ...needs to take a bath.
translation.zh: 我儿子需要洗个澡

translation.en: The only problem is... ...he's afraid to bathe alone.
translation.zh: 可问题是他害怕一个人洗澡

translation.en: So I was wondering... ...if maybe you could keep him company in the tub.
translation.zh: 所以我想问你 能不能陪他一起洗？

translation.en: Terrific. And after the bath, you have to try and study hard.
translation.zh: 太好了 洗完澡你要努力学习

translation.en: Because if you wanna be a member of the Scuba Squad... ...you have to be smart.
translation.zh: 因为你若想加入我们蛙人部队 就必须是个聪明孩子

translation.en: I could be in the Scuba Squad?
translation.zh: 我可以加入蛙人部队吗？

translation.en: Well, sure. All you have to do is work hard.
translation.zh: 那当然！只要你努力念书

translation.en: And don't tell a soul about the Scuba Squad...
translation.zh: 另外不要把蛙人部队的事 告诉任何人

translation.en: ...because then everybody will wanna join.
translation.zh: 否则人人都要加入了

translation.en: And one more thing... ...be nice to the delivery guy, would you?
translation.zh: 还有一件事 对那个送货员好一点，好吗？

translation.en: It's not his fault he can't read.
translation.zh: 他不识字那不是他的错

translation.en: Take care.
translation.zh: 再见！

translation.en: He told me to watch his boat for him. Said that he wanted to...
translation.zh: 是的是的 他要我照看他的船

translation.en: ...talk to you about some secret mission.
translation.zh: 他想跟你谈谈关于一项秘密

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 嗯，好吧

translation.en: How come I have to wear a bathing suit?
translation.zh: 我为什么要穿游泳裤洗澡？

translation.en: I don't know the rules...
translation.zh: 不知道，我不知道 关于孩子和大众裸体的规定

translation.en: ...with little kids and grownups and being naked and just sit down.
translation.zh: 不知道，我不知道 关于孩子和大众裸体的规定 坐下

translation.en: The good news is you're not smelling like a foot anymore.
translation.zh: 好消息是你身上 没有臭脚丫味了

translation.en: I read something interesting. You know Benjamin Franklin invented...
translation.zh: 我今天看到个有趣的故事 知道吗？ 那个本杰明富兰克林发现了 一双焦眼镜，真够酷的，嗯？

translation.en: ...bifocals? That's pretty cool.
translation.zh: 那个本杰明富兰克林发现了 一双焦眼镜，真够酷的，嗯？

translation.en: What are they?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: I'll show you in that book. It might help you out with your school play.
translation.zh: 我给你看看那本书 上面还有好多有趣的事 -也许对你在学校演出有帮助 -好吧

translation.en: We'll make this a regular thing. Bathing and studying and eating right.
translation.zh: 以后我们要养成习惯 按时洗澡、读书、吃健康食品

translation.en: Put your head back. My grandmother did this to me.
translation.zh: 头向后仰 我祖母总是这么给我洗澡

translation.en: "Oh, boy. When I was a little girl, frankfurters only cost a nickel."
translation.zh: "孩子，我还是小姑娘时 一个热狗只卖5分钱"

translation.en: Can you still have fun?
translation.zh: 我们还能一起玩吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but after you study.
translation.zh: 我们当然还要玩 先念书后玩

translation.en: In fact, we gotta get you dressing differently. -We'll go to Barney's. -Barney?
translation.zh: -要改变你穿着 洗完找巴尼 -巴尼？

translation.en: Not that Barney. A more expensive Barney.
translation.zh: 不是恐龙巴尼，另一个巴尼 更昂贵的巴尼

translation.en: All right, one at a time.
translation.zh: 对喽，每次拿一张

translation.en: That's one. Two.
See? Urinals are good too.
translation.zh: 看，小便池也不错嘛

translation.en: "Electricity."
translation.zh: 电

translation.en: Very good.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: "Constitution."
translation.zh: 是"宪法"

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 很正确

translation.en: "Philadelphia."
translation.zh: 这是"费城"

translation.en: Smart. Good.
translation.zh: 聪明，很好

translation.en: "Fish"?
"Pony"?
translation.zh: -小马？ -是

translation.en: "Hip--" "Hiphop--"
"Hipopynonamous"?
translation.zh: 河马？

translation.en: Damn you! You gave him the easy ones!
translation.zh: 可恶！你把简单的都给了他！

translation.en: -Thanks! -You're welcome.
translation.zh: 注意，减速 -谢谢 -不客气！

translation.en: Slow down.
translation.zh: 慢一点

translation.en: -You owe me a Sausage McMuffin. -Okay.
translation.zh: 你欠我一个香肠松饼 好的

translation.en: There's a pole there.
translation.zh: 那儿有根柱子

translation.en: My name is Alexander Hamilton. I was the first Secretary of the Treasury.
translation.zh: 我叫亚历山大汉米尔顿 是美国第一任财政部长

translation.en: I owned a bank and a newspaper. Aaron Bird shot me.
translation.zh: 我有一家银行和一个报社报纸 阿龙波尔杀了我

translation.en: Hi, my name is Benjamin Franklin.
translation.zh: 嗨，我的名字是 本杰明富兰克林

translation.en: I was a writer, a diplomat... ...an inventor and a statesman...
translation.zh: 我是个作家 也是外交官 发明家和政治家

translation.en: ...although I only went to school for two years.
translation.zh: 虽然我只上过两年学

translation.en: I wrote many books and invented many things we still use today.
translation.zh: 我写了许多书 还发明了很多东西 至今我们还在用

translation.en: The Declaration of Independence is finished.
translation.zh: 独立宣言写完了

translation.en: Who will be the first to sign?
translation.zh: 谁要签第一个名？ 约翰汉科克怎么样？

translation.en: -How about you, John Hancock? -I want to sign!
translation.zh: 谁要签第一个名？ 约翰汉科克怎么样？ 我要签，我要签

translation.en: -Look at my man stand strong. -He's so cute.
translation.zh: 你看我儿子站在那儿没动 他好可爱！

translation.en: What are your cards?
translation.zh: 你有什么牌？

translation.en: I got a six, a five, a jack, a four and a eight.
translation.zh: 我有1个6，1个5 1个J 1个4和1个8

translation.en: -I win. -What do you mean?
translation.zh: 我赢了！ 你怎么会赢了？

translation.en: I had a hand just like that. I didn't win.
translation.zh: 刚才我的牌和这一样 但我没有赢

translation.en: -Because I win. -This is bullshit!
translation.zh: 因为我赢了 真是活见鬼！

translation.en: All right. Take it easy, man.
translation.zh: 行了，冷静点

translation.en: Every time it's different cards.
translation.zh: 他每次的牌都不一样 可是他总是赢！

translation.en: So what? Relax. He's a kid.
translation.zh: 那又怎么样？ 他是个孩子

translation.en: There should be same set of rules, no matter what age.
translation.zh: 应该有个适用于所有人的规则 不论年纪大小都要遵守

translation.en: He's gotta learn how to lose too.
translation.zh: 他必须学会有赢有输！

translation.en: -Hello, Mr. Koufax. -Mr. Brooks, how you doing?
translation.zh: 你好，考法克斯先生 嗨，布鲁克斯先生，你好吗？ 我正准备给你回电话

translation.en: I was gonna give you a buzz.
translation.zh: 嗨，布鲁克斯先生，你好吗？ 我正准备给你回电话

translation.en: You just called me Mr. Koufax, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你刚才叫我考法克斯先生？

translation.en: It is your name, isn't it? Sonny Koufax?
translation.zh: 这不是你的名字吗？ 桑尼考法克斯？

translation.en: You held yourself out to be Kevin Gerrity... ...to gain custody of young Julian.
translation.zh: 你冒名顶替凯文盖瑞蒂 非法扣留小朱利安

translation.en: Big problem in this state.
translation.zh: 在本州这可是严重违法，桑尼

translation.en: I've delivered to you before. You always order three pieces of cheesecake.
translation.zh: 我给你送过外卖 你总是要3块奶酪蛋糕

translation.en: The real Kevin Gerrity asked me to take care of--
translation.zh: 真正的凯文盖瑞蒂打电话给我 他要我照顾这孩子

translation.en: Save it, Mr. Koufax.
translation.zh: 别再装了，考法克斯先生

translation.en: He has to come with me or I'll arrest you.
translation.zh: 这孩子必须马上跟我走 否则就逮捕你

translation.en: Take out your handcuffs.
translation.zh: 把你的手铐拿出来吧

translation.en: I don't have any, but two policemen downstairs do.
translation.zh: 我没有手铐 但等在楼下的两个警察有

translation.en: Listen, Sonny, I would like to help...
translation.zh: 听着桑尼，我很愿意帮忙

translation.en: ...but my status in your country is not what you would call legal.
translation.zh: 但我的身份在你们国家 不是那么太合法，我...

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: I'm Audi.
translation.zh: 我走了

translation.en: Julian, you're gonna have to come with me.
translation.zh: 朱利安，你必须跟我走

translation.en: -Just give me-- -Sonny.
translation.zh: -你得给我... -桑尼

translation.en: One second, pal.
translation.zh: 等一下，伙计

translation.en: Would you just give me a second to say goodbye to the kid?
translation.zh: 请给我一分钟让我和他道别

translation.en: Take a second.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: You don't want me here anymore?
translation.zh: 你不想要我住在这儿了？

translation.en: No, that's not it, pal. You just gotta go away for a little while.
translation.zh: 不，这是这么回事 你只是必须暂时离开这里

translation.en: How long am I going away for?
translation.zh: 那我要离开多久？

translation.en: I don't wanna lie to you.
translation.zh: 我不想骗你

translation.en: I don't think we're gonna... ...be seeing each other anymore.
translation.zh: 我想咱们可能，无法再见面了

translation.en: I screwed up, pal. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 是我搞糟了，对不起

translation.en: Come here. Put your coat on.
translation.zh: 过来，穿上外衣...

translation.en: It's not your fault, okay? I'm the idiot.
translation.zh: 这不是你的错，知道吗？ 我是个笨蛋

translation.en: -I don't wanna go. -I know you don't.
translation.zh: 我不想走！ 我知道你不想，但你必须走 你不会有事的，好吗？

translation.en: But you have to, and you're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 我知道你不想，但你必须走 你不会有事的，好吗？

translation.en: Please don't make me go.
translation.zh: 求你别让我走！

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I don't know what else to do.
translation.zh: 对不起，我不知道还能做什么

translation.en: I won't play the kangaroo song anymore.
translation.zh: 我不再玩袋鼠先生唱歌了

translation.en: Just go. You gotta go. You gotta go.
translation.zh: 去吧，你必须走，必须走

translation.en: I don't wanna go. I promise...
translation.zh: 我不想走！

translation.en: ...I'm sorry. I don't even like that song anymore.
translation.zh: 我保证，对不起 我一点也不喜欢袋鼠歌了

translation.en: I know, pal. That's not it.
translation.zh: 我知道，孩子，跟那没关系

translation.en: But I wipe my own ass! I wipe my own ass!
translation.zh: 我自己擦屁股！ 我自己擦屁股！

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道！

translation.en: -Layla, they took the kid. -Who?
translation.zh: -莱拉，他们把孩子带走了 -谁？

translation.en: Social Services. I gotta get him back.
translation.zh: 社会福利部 我必须把他讨回来

translation.en: You said this was just temporary.
translation.zh: 你什么意思？ 你说那只是暂时

translation.en: I can't have it be temporary. It's gotta be permanent.
translation.zh: 我是说过，可我受不了 我要把它变成永久的

translation.en: Okay, what can we do?
translation.zh: 那好，我们能做什么？

translation.en: I filed to get custody based on the child's best interests.
translation.zh: 我要求法院为了孩子最大利益 将监护权交给我

translation.en: Tommy knew a clerk, so they fast-tracked the hearing. It's Tuesday.
translation.zh: 汤米认识法院的办事员 他们将听证会提前了 是星期二，你一定要去

translation.en: -This Tuesday? -You got work?
translation.zh: 这个星期二？ 你有工作？

translation.en: I gotta go to Washington for a hearing to dismiss my case.
translation.zh: 我必须去华盛顿 有个听证会要撤消我的案子

translation.en: Can you get somebody else?
translation.zh: 不能让别人替你去吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry, Sonny. I can't. It's my case.
translation.zh: 对不起，桑尼 不行，那是我的案子

translation.en: We don't even know where this kid's gonna end up.
translation.zh: 那朱利安的案子咋办？ 我们甚至不知 这孩子的结局会怎样

translation.en: Sonny, this is exactly why I didn't wanna get involved.
translation.zh: 桑尼，这正是 我不愿意卷进去的原因

translation.en: I had things going the way I wanted.
translation.zh: 本来我的一切很有条不紊

translation.en: Then at the park, you and this kid come barging into my life...
translation.zh: 某天我坐在公园里 你和那孩子就闯入了我的生活

translation.en: ...and it's screwing up everything I had planned.
translation.zh: 并且破坏了我所有的计划

translation.en: You think I planned on a kid showing up on my doorstep?
translation.zh: 一个孩子出现在我的门前 你以为那是我计划好的？

translation.en: But I fell in love with him.
translation.zh: 但是我爱上他了

translation.en: So now my plans have changed.
translation.zh: 所以我的计划全变了

translation.en: All rise.
translation.zh: 起立

translation.en: We're here to determine proper custody of Julian McGrath...
translation.zh: 早上好，今天我们在这里 将决定一个孩子监护权的归属

translation.en: ...also known as Julian Gerrity, a minor child.
translation.zh: 朱利安麦格拉斯 也叫朱利安盖瑞蒂的

translation.en: Representing New York City?
translation.zh: 纽约市政府的代表？

translation.en: Ted Castellucci.
translation.zh: 泰德卡斯特鲁奇

translation.en: Arthur Brooks, Social Services.
translation.zh: 阿瑟布鲁克斯 社会福利部

translation.en: And representing Sonny Koufax?
translation.zh: 桑尼考法克斯的代表？

translation.en: Phillip D'Amato.
translation.zh: 菲利普德马多

translation.en: Thomas Grayton.
translation.zh: 托马斯格瑞顿

translation.en: Plus, I'll pretty much be representing myself.
translation.zh: 还有我 我愿意代表自己，法官大人

translation.en: Anyone else?
translation.zh: 还有吗？

translation.en: Layla Maloney, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 莱拉马隆尼，法官大人

translation.en: -Thank you. -Does this mean that you love me?
translation.zh: -谢谢 -这是表示你爱我，莱拉？

translation.en: Something like that.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: First witness.
translation.zh: 第一位证人

translation.en: Koufax is a good egg. He was nice to that kid.
translation.zh: 考法克斯是个好小子 他对那孩子非常好

translation.en: But he fights like a girl. You like that?
translation.zh: 但他打起架来像个姑娘 你看怎么样？

translation.en: I'm right here, miss. What are you gonna do about it?
translation.zh: 我现在就坐在这儿 你能拿我怎么样？

translation.en: Are you drunk, Mr. Herlihy?
translation.zh: 怎么，你喝醉了？

translation.en: I had a few chardonnays. What of it?
translation.zh: 我是喝了几杯白葡萄酒 那又怎么样？

translation.en: Get off the stand.
translation.zh: 请证人退席

translation.en: You got it. I've got a few problems.
translation.zh: 没问题，只是有点小麻烦

translation.en: Off to a good start.
translation.zh: 多好的开场

translation.en: Mr. Koufax is a really cool guy. I wish my dad was as cool as him.
translation.zh: 考法克斯先生 真的是个好人 我希望我爸爸能像他一样好

translation.en: My dad was a military man. Guess I wasn't such a "good soldier."
translation.zh: 我爸爸是个军人 可我不是一个好士兵

translation.en: When I was 35, he attempted to give me a crew cut while I was sleeping.
translation.zh: 我35岁那年 他想趁我睡着了给我剪个平头

translation.en: I broke his arm, haven't seen him since.
translation.zh: 我醒了，打断了他的一只胳膊 从此再没见过他

translation.en: I'd rather live on the streets than under his rules.
translation.zh: 我宁可露宿街头 也不愿遵守他的狗屁规矩！

translation.en: Anyway, I think Mr. Koufax should be acquitted of all the charges.
translation.zh: 不管怎么样 我认为应该免除对 考法克斯先生的一切指控

translation.en: If O.J. can get away with murder, why can't Sonny have his kid?
translation.zh: 如果汤普森谋杀罪不成立 为什么桑尼不能到那孩子？

translation.en: This guy knows what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 这家伙知道我的意思

translation.en: No more questions.
translation.zh: 没有问题了

translation.en: No more questions....
translation.zh: 没有问题了

translation.en: How long have you delivered food to Mr. Koufax?
translation.zh: 你为考法克斯先生 送吃的有多久了？

translation.en: I deliver food for six years.
translation.zh: 我给他送了6年

translation.en: Plus, I'm stripper. But I've put on weight so it's problem.
translation.zh: 我还是个脱衣舞表演家 但现在我的体重很成问题

translation.en: I see. And in your experience, was Sonny a good father to Julian?
translation.zh: 明白了，根据你的观察 桑尼对朱利安是个好父亲吗？

translation.en: Oh, yes. They make terrific pair.
translation.zh: 当然！他们是天生的一对

translation.en: They went together like lamb and tuna fish.
translation.zh: 就像羊肉和金枪鱼

translation.en: Lamb and tuna fish?
translation.zh: 羊肉和金枪鱼？

translation.en: Spaghetti and meatball? You more comfortable with that analogy?
translation.zh: 也许你比较喜欢通心粉和肉丸 这种比喻你们觉得更舒服？

translation.en: Yes, considering we're in America.
translation.zh: 是的，毕竟我们是在美国！

translation.en: If you don't like spaghetti and meatballs, get out.
translation.zh: 你若不喜欢通心粉和肉丸 干嘛不早点滚出去？

translation.en: I'll come give you a crew cut.
translation.zh: 嘿，我现在就下去 给你剃个平头，先生！

translation.en: Let's see your clippers.
translation.zh: 让我看看你的剪刀

translation.en: Not my problem your dad was sick.
translation.zh: 你父亲是个疯子不关我的事

translation.en: Stop yelling at me!
translation.zh: 不许对我大喊大叫！

translation.en: Order! Order! Order!
translation.zh: 肃静！肃静！肃静！

translation.en: Am I in the right room?
translation.zh: 对不起，我没走错地方吧？

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你又是什么人？

translation.en: I'm Mr. Koufax's co-counsel.
translation.zh: 我是考法克斯先生的辩护律师

translation.en: He has enough co-counsels.
translation.zh: 他的律师够多了

translation.en: ...one more won't hurt.
translation.zh: 那么再多一个也没关系

translation.en: Let's get on with it.
translation.zh: 我们继续吧！下一个证人！

translation.en: Mr. Koufax is simply parading his buddies up there.
translation.zh: 法官大人，考法克斯 先把自己的朋友都叫来作证

translation.en: Can't they find someone who isn't a friend?
translation.zh: 他们能找一个 不是朋友的证人吗？

translation.en: What were Julian and Mr. Koufax doing?
translation.zh: 看到朱利安和考法克斯先生时 他们在做什么？

translation.en: Shopping.
translation.zh: 购物

translation.en: Did he appear to be an attentive, loving father?
translation.zh: 当时考法克斯先生 是个有爱心的好父亲吗？

translation.en: He certainly did.
translation.zh: 他确实是

translation.en: And how long have you disliked Mr. Koufax?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢考法克斯先生 有多久了？

translation.en: Since the day I met him.
translation.zh: 从我见到他那天起

translation.en: For the record, where did you work during medical school?
translation.zh: 为了记录请问你 在读医学院前在哪儿工作？

translation.en: Hooters.
translation.zh: 丰乳酒吧

translation.en: No further questions.
translation.zh: 我没有问题了

translation.en: Asshole.
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: Next witness.
translation.zh: 下一个证人

translation.en: We'd like to call Julian McGrath.
translation.zh: 法官大人 我们想询问朱利安麦格拉斯

translation.en: If it's okay with you, I'd like to ask you a few questions.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意，朱利安 我想问你几个问题

translation.en: This is just you and me talking... ...so don't pay attention to these people.
translation.zh: 这只是你和我两个之间的谈话 所以别要管其他人好吗？

translation.en: Can you tell me how old you are?
translation.zh: 能告诉我你几岁了吗？

translation.en: Your Honor, one second.
translation.zh: 法官大人，请稍等

translation.en: That's better, huh?
translation.zh: 这样好多了吧？

translation.en: Can you tell me how old you are?
translation.zh: 现在能告诉我你几岁了吗？

translation.en: Five.
translation.zh: 五岁

translation.en: What's your birthday?
translation.zh: 你的生日是哪天？

translation.en: July 15th.
translation.zh: 7月15日

translation.en: Where were you born?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿出生的？

translation.en: Toronto.
translation.zh: 多伦多

translation.en: Toronto? I thought you were from Buffalo.
translation.zh: 多伦多？我以为是水牛城

translation.en: I moved to Buffalo with my mommy.
translation.zh: 我跟妈妈搬到水牛城

translation.en: For the past six weeks, you've been living with Sonny?
translation.zh: 过去六个星期 你一直和桑尼住在一起对吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -Did you and Sonny have fun? -Yes.
translation.zh: 你和桑尼在一起很快乐吗？ 是！

translation.en: What kind of things would you do?
translation.zh: 你和桑尼在一起都干些什么？

translation.en: He taught me how to do the sleeper hold like Chief Jay Strongbow.
translation.zh: 他教我怎么摔跤让人昏过去 就像强弓乔伊长官

translation.en: That's nice. Anything else?
translation.zh: 非常好，还干些什么？

translation.en: He taught me how to pee on a building.
translation.zh: 他教我怎么往墙上尿尿

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: And he taught me that Styx was one of the greatest American rock bands.
translation.zh: 他教我冥河乐队 是美国最好的摇滚乐队之一

translation.en: They only caught a bad rap... ...because most critics are cynical assholes.
translation.zh: 他们没有成功的唯一原因 就那些音乐评论人都是混蛋

translation.en: I think we'd all agree with that.
translation.zh: 我想我也赞成这观点

translation.en: Before you came here, do you remember...
translation.zh: 你没到桑尼家之前

translation.en: ...the last thing your mommy said to you?
translation.zh: 还记得妈妈最后 跟你说了什么吗？

translation.en: That she loved me and I was gonna live with my new daddy.
translation.zh: 他爱我，还有我要 跟新爸爸一起生活

translation.en: If your mother could pick anyone to be your new daddy...
translation.zh: 如果你妈妈可以选择世界上 任何一个人当你的新爸爸

translation.en: ...who would she pick?
translation.zh: 你认为她会选谁？

translation.en: Sonny.
translation.zh: 桑尼

translation.en: Thank you, Julian. You can step down now.
translation.zh: 谢谢，朱利安 你可以下来了

translation.en: That went good, don't you think?
translation.zh: 现在开始对我们有利了

translation.en: I don't know. Judge doesn't look too happy.
translation.zh: 我不知道 法官看上去不太高兴

translation.en: Mr. Koufax, anyone else?
translation.zh: 考法克斯先生，还有证人吗？

translation.en: I'd like to call upon myself, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 我想传唤我自己，法官大人

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Which of your esteemed co-counsels will examine you?
translation.zh: 你的哪位辩护律师向你提问？

translation.en: My father, Lenny Koufax.
translation.zh: 我父亲 莱尼考法克斯先生

translation.en: What? Forget it, Sonny.
translation.zh: 什么？不可能，桑尼！

translation.en: What is going on?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事！

translation.en: Nobody in this world thinks I shouldn't have a child more than that man.
translation.zh: 法官大人 这世上没有一个人比后面那人 更反对我收养这个孩子

translation.en: He also happens to be a well-respected lawyer in Florida.
translation.zh: 他正好是佛罗里达 最受尊敬的律师之一

translation.en: If I can make a believer out of him, I can make a believer out of everybody.
translation.zh: 如果我能说服他 我就能说服法庭上所有的人

translation.en: This court is after the truth, not the opinion of the defendant's father.
translation.zh: 我反对，法官大人 本案的依据应该是事实 而不是被告父亲的观点

translation.en: You want my opinion? My son is a moron.
translation.zh: 想问我的意见？ 我儿子是个低能儿

translation.en: I withdraw my objection. Please proceed.
translation.zh: 我收回抗议，请继续

translation.en: Mr. Koufax.
translation.zh: 考法克斯先生！

translation.en: This is a big mistake.
translation.zh: 这一个严重的错误，桑尼

translation.en: I only came today to make sure you didn't end up in jail.
translation.zh: 我来这里的唯一原因 是不想看你为此进监狱

translation.en: That was nice of you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 你真是太好了，谢谢

translation.en: To do what I think is right here.
translation.zh: 我将做我应该做的事 好的

translation.en: Cut your fingernails. They're too long.
translation.zh: 这事完了剪剪手指甲 太长了

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
translation.zh: 好的，爸爸

translation.en: This case is simple.
translation.zh: 法官大人，这案子很简单

translation.en: It is absurd to think that Sonny Koufax is ready to raise a child.
translation.zh: 认为桑尼考法克斯 有能力抚养一个孩子 这想法太荒谬了！

translation.en: -Objection! -Shut up, Tommy.
translation.zh: 我反对！ 闭嘴，汤米！

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Koufax.
translation.zh: 对不起，考法克斯先生

translation.en: First of all, how did...
translation.zh: 首先

translation.en: ...this sweet little boy, Julian, end up under your supervision?
translation.zh: 这个可爱的男孩朱利安 是怎么得到你的监护的？

translation.en: I told Social Services that my name was Kevin Gerrity.
translation.zh: 我告诉社会福利部 我是凯文盖瑞蒂

translation.en: -Of course, you are not Kevin Gerrity. -No.
translation.zh: -可你当然不是凯文盖瑞蒂 -不是

translation.en: -So you lied. -Yes.
translation.zh: -所以你撒谎了？ -是的

translation.en: Like the time I found a bag of pot in your drawer...
translation.zh: 就像当初我在你内裤兜里 发现大麻时

translation.en: ...and you said you thought they were pencil shavings.
translation.zh: 你告诉我你以为那是铅笔屑

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Remember when I told you Aunt Fay was coming to New York...
translation.zh: 记得吗？我曾打电话告诉你 菲尔姨妈要到纽约来

translation.en: ...and I wanted you to show her the city?
translation.zh: 我希望你带她四处看看

translation.en: And you said that you had better things to do.
translation.zh: 你说你有更重要的事要做？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm curious. Just what were those better things that you had to do?
translation.zh: 现在我想知道 你当时有什么事要做？

translation.en: Jethro Tull had a reunion concert in New Jersey, so I caught that.
translation.zh: 英国最热闹的摇滚乐队 在新泽西演出，我去那儿了

translation.en: What happened to Aunt Fay that weekend?
translation.zh: 那个周末 你菲尔姨妈发生了什么事？

translation.en: She died.
translation.zh: 她死了

translation.en: Yes, she did.
translation.zh: 对，她死了

translation.en: Did you happen to make it to her funeral?
translation.zh: 那么你有没有出席她的葬礼？

translation.en: -Why not? -I went to Jones Beach...
translation.zh: 为什么？ 我去了琼斯湾 喝醉了睡了很长时间

translation.en: ...got drunk and fell asleep.
translation.zh: 我去了琼斯湾 喝醉了睡了很长时间

translation.en: Hell, yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: Some role model.
translation.zh: 好一个模范

translation.en: Your Honor...
translation.zh: 法官大人

translation.en: ...my son doesn't have health insurance. He doesn't know how to boil an egg.
translation.zh: 我儿子没有健康保险 他不知道怎么煮鸡蛋

translation.en: He filed for social security at the age of 30.
translation.zh: 30岁向法院申请社会救济

translation.en: He is a drain on the economy, on the country... ...and most of all, on me!
translation.zh: 他是这个国家的财富的无底洞 也同样是我的

translation.en: Your Honor, to give this young man...
translation.zh: 法官大人 将另一个人的监护权交给他 不仅是错的

translation.en: ...custody over another life is not only wrong...
translation.zh: 将另一个人的监护权交给他 不仅是错的

translation.en: ...it's insane.
translation.zh: 简直是发疯

translation.en: Hey. I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: -What? -Don't be scared. It's all right.
translation.zh: 什么？ 你不用害怕 我不会有事的

translation.en: I'm not scared.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我没有害怕

translation.en: If I get custody of Julian, I'll be his father forever.
translation.zh: 如果我得到朱利安的监护权 我将永远做他的父亲

translation.en: That scares you because you think there's a good chance I'll fail.
translation.zh: 这让你感到害怕 因为我很可能会失败

translation.en: Sonny, it's more than a chance. It's a certainty.
translation.zh: 桑尼，这不是一种可能 而是一个必然

translation.en: You're wrong, Dad.
translation.zh: 你错了，爸爸

translation.en: You can be scared that I might get pickpocketed in a bad neighborhood...
translation.zh: 你可以害怕我 可能在街上碰上小偷

translation.en: ...or break my legs skiing.
translation.zh: 或是我可能擦破腿上的皮

translation.en: But don't be scared about me being a dad, because I will not fail.
translation.zh: 但是不要害怕我会做个父亲 因为我不会失败，我不能失败

translation.en: I love this kid too much. I love him as much as you love me, Dad.
translation.zh: 我太爱这个孩子 我爱他就像你爱我一样，爸爸

translation.en: I'm gonna give him advice and I'm gonna guide him...
translation.zh: 我要给他建议，我要引导他

translation.en: ...and I'll be there whenever he needs me.
translation.zh: 我要在他需要我时 随时出现在他身边

translation.en: I'll fly to New York to be at his court case...
translation.zh: 我要飞到纽约出庭为他辩护

translation.en: ...even if I disagree with why he's there.
translation.zh: 尽管我可能不赞成 让他上法庭的原因

translation.en: But, Sonny, you work in a tollbooth.
translation.zh: 可是桑尼 你在公路收费站工作

translation.en: Don't worry about money.
translation.zh: 别害怕我挣不到钱

translation.en: I am in love with a beautiful girl who makes plenty of it.
translation.zh: 我和一个漂亮姑娘相爱 她赚的钱足够了

translation.en: She'll be my sugar mama.
translation.zh: 她将是我的阔太太

translation.en: I gotta get me one of those.
translation.zh: 噢，我也应该找一个

translation.en: I know this is the right thing because I would die for this kid...
translation.zh: 我知道我这么做是对的，爸爸 因为我宁愿为这孩子死 只为不让他感到一丁点悲伤

translation.en: ...just so he won't feel one ounce of sadness.
translation.zh: 因为我宁愿为这孩子死 只为不让他感到一丁点悲伤

translation.en: That's why you're here right now, to protect me, to be scared for me...
translation.zh: 这也是你来这里的原因 为了保护我，为我担惊受怕

translation.en: ...to be a good father.
translation.zh: 来作一个好父亲

translation.en: And that's exactly what I'm gonna be.
translation.zh: 这也正是我要做的

translation.en: Hello, Dad?
translation.zh: 喂，爸爸？

translation.en: Yeah, I just wanted to say I love you.
translation.zh: 是的 我只想告诉你我爱你

translation.en: Hi, Mom? Could you put Dad on the phone for a second?
translation.zh: 嗨妈妈，能让爸爸听电话吗？

translation.en: Can I borrow that when you're done?
translation.zh: 你说完了 借我用一下吧？

translation.en: Your Honor...
translation.zh: 法官大人

translation.en: ...my son deserves this kid.
translation.zh: 我儿子应该得到这孩子

translation.en: I love you too, sir.
translation.zh: 我也爱你，长官

translation.en: Mr. Koufax...
translation.zh: 考法克斯先生

translation.en: ...the fact is you kidnapped this child.
translation.zh: 事实上你绑架了这个孩子

translation.en: Not only shouldn't you get custody...
translation.zh: 不仅不能得到监护权

translation.en: ...but since you obtained him by defrauding the state...
translation.zh: 由于非法拘留这孩子 严重违反纽约州法律

translation.en: ...you should be in jail.
translation.zh: 你必须坐牢！

translation.en: Bailiff, remand him until I can figure out the punishment.
translation.zh: 法警，将他还押 直到我决定对他的处罚 -法官大人 -等等，你们不能拘留他

translation.en: Wait. You can't take him away.
translation.zh: -法官大人 -等等，你们不能拘留他

translation.en: As that boy's father, I refuse to press charges.
translation.zh: 作为孩子的父亲 我拒绝控告他

translation.en: Oh, God. Corinne, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 噢，上帝 科琳娜，对不起 6年前，乔卡特

translation.en: Six years ago, Joe Carter....
translation.zh: 科琳娜，对不起 6年前，乔卡特

translation.en: Joe Carter?
translation.zh: 乔卡特？

translation.en: Toronto and the Phillies. World Series.
translation.zh: 多伦多和费城的比赛 要知道，全是世界著名球星

translation.en: Mitch Williams-- We flew up for the night.
translation.zh: 多伦多和费城的比赛 要知道，全是世界著名球星 那天晚上我们飞到那儿看比赛 那里有个女孩

translation.en: -There was a girl. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: 那天晚上我们飞到那儿看比赛 那里有个女孩 噢，天哪

translation.en: I'm an idiot. I was so hammered.
translation.zh: 我是个白痴 当时我喝太多了

translation.en: Chicken wings, Molson 3-0. Canadian beer is like moonshine.
translation.zh: 炸鸡翅，莫尔森啤酒 加拿大啤酒烈得像威士忌

translation.en: Hell, yes.
translation.zh: 对，没错

translation.en: You remember? It was at that Toronto Hooters.
translation.zh: 桑尼，你还记得，对吗？ 那是在，多伦多丰乳酒吧

translation.en: That was before he met you. That Hooters thing is a coincidence.
translation.zh: 那是在他认识你之前，科琳娜 那个丰乳酒吧完全是巧合

translation.en: I'm sorry, Corinne.
translation.zh: 对不起，科琳娜

translation.en: I know this changes everything, but I had to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 我知道这将改变一切 可是，我不能不这么做

translation.en: Mr. Castellucci.
translation.zh: 卡斯特鲁奇先生？

translation.en: Pending a blood test, I.... Whatever.
translation.zh: 我，嗯 我建议验血，怎么都行

translation.en: The court grants custody to Kevin Gerrity, pending the DNA test results.
translation.zh: 法庭宣布监护权归凯文盖瑞蒂 等待DNA检验结果

translation.en: I want you to be my dad, Sonny.
translation.zh: 我要你当我爸爸，桑尼

translation.en: I know. I do too, pal.
translation.zh: 我知道，我也希望

translation.en: But I'm not sure that can happen exactly the way we want it.
translation.zh: 但我不能保证任何事 都会随我们的心愿

translation.en: Because it seems you already have a daddy.
translation.zh: 因为看来你已经有父亲了

translation.en: But I'll tell you what I can do.
translation.zh: 但我要告诉你我能做什么

translation.en: I can be your friend, no matter what. All right?
translation.zh: 我可以作你的朋友 无论发生什么，好吗？

translation.en: I'll always be your friend.
translation.zh: 我永远是你的朋友

translation.en: I'll always be your family. I'll always be around. I promise.
translation.zh: 永远是你的家人 我永远在你身边，我保证

translation.en: The kid's good at tying his shoes.
translation.zh: 这孩子努力试着系鞋带 虽然系得还不好

translation.en: He's not great at it, so work with him.
translation.zh: 这孩子努力试着系鞋带 虽然系得还不好 所以你要帮他

translation.en: -I'll teach him bunny ears. -What's bunny ears?
translation.zh: 也许我可以教他结兔耳朵结 什么是兔耳朵结？

translation.en: Make bunny ears, cross and pull them through.
translation.zh: 先做两个圈再把它们交叉 伸过来拉紧

translation.en: I go with this loop, swoop and pull thing. He likes that.
translation.zh: 嗯，我教他打的是圈结 圈绕圈再拉紧，他喜欢这个

translation.en: -I don't know that. -Go with the loop, swoop and pull.
translation.zh: 我不会那种结 兔耳结更简单 还是做个圈绕一圈再拉紧 我敢发誓这招管用

translation.en: I swear to God it's working.
translation.zh: 还是做个圈绕一圈再拉紧 我敢发誓这招管用

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: Go with the bunny ears thing. You're his dad, right? I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 知道吗？还是用你的兔耳朵吧 你是他爸爸，对吗？对不起

translation.en: It's important, when you eat at my restaurant... ...you never order BLT.
translation.zh: 到我的餐厅吃饭你一定要记住 决不要点公司三明治

translation.en: You must trust me. Stay away from BLT, okay?
translation.zh: 你必须相信我，别要三明治

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嘿，伙计们

translation.en: I'm gonna leave you with your dad now, Julian.
translation.zh: 朱利安 我现在要让你和爸爸呆一会

translation.en: He's a good man. I've known him my whole life.
translation.zh: 他是个非常好的人 我们是好朋友铁哥们

translation.en: So you two have fun and I'll see you in the morning.
translation.zh: 你们两个好好玩 明天早餐时咱们再见

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: -Quit scaring the kid for a minute. -Who am I scaring?
translation.zh: 别再吓唬孩子了 我吓着谁了？

translation.en: Bye, pal.
translation.zh: 再见伙计

translation.en: Hey, Julian. I went to China. Do you know where that is?
translation.zh: 嘿，朱利安，我刚从中国回来 你知道中国在哪儿吗？

translation.en: It's in Asia, which is...
translation.zh: 她在亚洲，欧洲的旁边

translation.en: ...by Europe. I brought some cool stuff back.
translation.zh: 她在亚洲，欧洲的旁边 我给你带来点好玩的东西

translation.en: Did you move the bench?
translation.zh: 是你动了椅子吗？

translation.en: That's pretty funny.
translation.zh: 这很可笑对吗？

translation.en: You know what I got? Some noisemakers. Check this out.
translation.zh: 知道我有什么？ 是砸炮，你看...

translation.en: Wanna try one?
translation.zh: 想试试吗？

translation.en: That's my foot!
translation.zh: 你没砸到我的脚

translation.en: You're nice man.
translation.zh: 你是个好人 听着，我家能收到色情电视

translation.en: I've got Spice Channel. It's blurry but it's nice.
translation.zh: 你是个好人 听着，我家能收到色情电视 不太清楚 但是很刺激 "一年三个月零六天后"

translation.en: Let's make this quick. I gotta get to work.
translation.zh: 咱们只呆一会 我要赶回去工作

translation.en: Holy shit. Sonny Koufax would rather work than eat.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 桑尼考法克斯为了工作不吃饭

translation.en: I'm working on a big case. I gotta sue you for making me come here.
translation.zh: 我在经手一个大案子 我要起诉你们拖我到这种地方

translation.en: Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: Did you just waste the good surprise on me again?
translation.zh: 你们是不是又把满腔热情 浪费在我身上了？

translation.en: Hi, Corinne.
translation.zh: 嗨，科琳娜

translation.en: -Happy birthday. -Thanks, everybody.
translation.zh: -生日快乐 -谢谢

translation.en: Hey, you guys. How are you?
translation.zh: 你好吗？ 嘿，你们都好吗？

translation.en: Happy birthday, Daddy.
translation.zh: 生日快乐，爸爸

translation.en: How you doing, cutie?
translation.zh: 你怎么样，宝贝？

translation.en: Sonny, I beat you so bad in basketball yesterday.
translation.zh: 桑尼，昨天打篮球 你被我打得落花流水

translation.en: From now on, I have to stop letting you win.
translation.zh: 从现在起打球我不能再让你了

translation.en: I stopped that months ago. He still wins.
translation.zh: 六个月前我就不再让他了 可他还是赢我

translation.en: That's because you suck.
translation.zh: 那是因为你太差了

translation.en: Corinne, put a tank top on for old time's sake.
translation.zh: 科琳娜，你干嘛不穿上无袖衫 回忆一下过去？快点！

translation.en: -What is he talking about, Mommy? -Nothing.
translation.zh: 他在说什么，妈妈？ 别理他！

translation.en: -Happy birthday, Sonny. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 生日快乐，桑尼 嘿嘿嘿，谢谢

translation.en: It's a clock radio.
translation.zh: 我送你一个闹钟收音机

translation.en: -Thanks for telling me. -I have to split.
translation.zh: 是个闹钟收音机？ 谢谢你告诉我 我要走了，还有外卖要送

translation.en: I got deliveries.
translation.zh: 我要走了，还有外卖要送

translation.en: Hang out with us. We'll have fun.
translation.zh: 别走，多呆一会 我们在一起多有意思

translation.en: No, I can't stay. I'll hang for a little bit.
translation.zh: 不不不，我不能留下... 那我就再呆一会儿

translation.en: There you go. Come on, let's eat, everybody.
translation.zh: 好了 大家一起开始吃吧

translation.en: Hey, you! Still missing that tooth, huh?
translation.zh: 那颗牙还没长出来？

translation.en: Can we get some fries?
translation.zh: 能给我们拿些炸薯条卷吗？

translation.en: -Vanessa. -Hi, Sonny.
translation.zh: 瓦妮莎？ 嗨，桑尼

translation.en: You're a Hooters girl? What happened to Sid's five-year plan?
translation.zh: 你当了丰乳女招待？ 希德的五年计划怎么了？

translation.en: How you doing?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: -Maybe it's a 10-year plan. -Is that the guy with the old balls?
translation.zh: 也许是10年计划？ 他就是那个糟老头吗？

translation.en: I think it is.
translation.zh: 对，我想是的

translation.en: Come on. I bet they're nice.
translation.zh: 嘿，别生气啊

translation.en: You're not supposed to say "balls." Testicles. Okay?
translation.zh: 你听着，你不应该说糟老头 应该说老爷爷，懂了？
